ezekiyeli:1:1: Ezekiyeli yerekwa icyubahiro cy’Imana n’ibizima bine1.Mu mwaka wa mirongo itatu, mu kwezi kwa kane, ku munsi wa gatanu w’uko kwezi nari mu mbohe ku mugezi Kebari, ijuru rirakinguka maze mbona ibyo neretswe n’Imana.
ezekiyeli:1:2: 2.Ku munsi wa gatanu w’ukwezi, hari mu mwaka wa gatanu Umwami Yehoyakini ajyanywe ari imbohe,
ezekiyeli:1:3: 3.ijambo ry’Uwiteka ryeruriye ku mutambyi Ezekiyeli mwene Buzi, ari mu gihugu cy’Abakaludaya ku mugezi wa Kebari, aho ni ho ukuboko k’Uwiteka kwamujeho.
ezekiyeli:1:4: 4.Maze ngiye kubona mbona umuyaga w’ishuheri uje uturutse ikasikazi, igicu cya rukokoma gishibagura umuriro gikikijwe n’umucyo w’itangaza, kandi hagati y’uwo muriro haturukaga ibara nk’iry’umuringa ukūbye.
ezekiyeli:1:5: 5.Muri wo hagati haturutsemo ishusho y’ibizima bine, kandi uku ni ko byasaga: byari bifite ishusho y’umuntu;
ezekiyeli:1:6: 6.kandi buri kimwe cyari gifite mu maso hane, buri kimwe cyari gifite n’amababa ane
ezekiyeli:1:7: 7.Kandi ibirenge byabyo byari birambije, mu bworo bw’ibirenge byabyo hari hameze nko mu rwara rw’inyana, kandi byarabagiranaga nk’umuringa ukūbye.
ezekiyeli:1:8: 8.Kandi byari bifite amaboko y’umuntu munsi y’amababa yabyo mu mpande zabyo uko ari enye, uko ari bine ni ko byari bifite mu maso habyo n’amababa yabyo,
ezekiyeli:1:9: 9.amababa yabyo rimwe ryari rifatanye n’irindi. Ntabwo byahindukiraga bigenda, byose byagendaga umujya umwe.
ezekiyeli:1:10: 10.Mu maso habyo uko hasaga byari bifite nko mu maso h’umuntu, kandi byose uko ari bine bifite nko mu maso h’intare mu ruhande rw’iburyo, kandi uko ari bine byari bifite nko mu maso h’inka mu ruhande rw’ibumoso, kandi uko ari bine byari bifite nko mu maso h’igisiga.
ezekiyeli:1:11: 11.Kandi mu maso habyo n’amababa yabyo hejuru byari bitandukanye, amababa abiri ya buri kimwe yahuraga n’ay’ibindi, kandi abiri agatwikira imibiri yabyo.
ezekiyeli:1:12: 12.Kandi byose byagendaga umujya umwe, aho umwuka werekeraga ni ho byajyaga, ntabwo byakebukaga bigenda.
ezekiyeli:1:13: 13.Uko ishusho y’ibizima yari imeze, byasaga n’amakara y’umuriro waka nk’uko inkongi zisa, umuriro wagurumaniraga hirya no hino hagati y’ibizima. Uwo muriro warakaga cyane kandi muri uwo muriro havagamo umurabyo.
ezekiyeli:1:14: 14.Ibyo bizima byarirukaga, bigakimirana nk’umurabyo urabya.
ezekiyeli:1:15: 15.Nuko nitegereje ibyo bizima mbona uruziga rumwe ruri ku isi iruhande rw’ibyo bizima, imbere yo mu maso habyo uko ari bine
ezekiyeli:1:16: 16.Inziga n’imibarizwe yazo uko zari zimeze zasaga n’ibara rya tarushishi, kandi zose uko ari enye zarasaga. Uko zari zimeze n’imibarizwe yazo, byasaga nk’aho uruziga rumwe runyura mu rundi ruziga.
ezekiyeli:1:17: 17.Iyo zagendaga zagendaga zerekeye mu mpande zazo enye, ntabwo zateshukaga inzira zigenda.
ezekiyeli:1:18: 18.Amagurudumu yazo yageraga hejuru bigatera ubwoba, kandi zose uko ari enye amagurudumu yazo yari yuzuweho n’amaso.
ezekiyeli:1:19: 19.Kandi ibizima iyo byagendaga, inziga na zo zagendaga iruhande rwabyo, kandi iyo ibizima byazamurwaga bikuwe ku isi n’inziga zarazamurwaga.
ezekiyeli:1:20: 20.Aho umwuka werekeraga hose ni ho byajyaga, kandi ni ho umwuka yashakaga kujya. Inziga zikaba ari ho zizamurirwa iruhande rwabyo, kuko umwuka w’ikizima cyose wari mu nziga.
ezekiyeli:1:21: 21.Iyo byagendaga na zo zaragendaga, byahagarara zigahagarara, kandi iyo byazamurwaga bikuwe mu isi inziga na zo zazamurirwaga iruhande rwabyo, kuko umwuka w’ikizima cyose wari mu nziga.
ezekiyeli:1:22: 22.Hejuru y’umutwe w’ikizima hari ikimeze nk’ijuru gisa n’ibirahuri biteye ubwoba, bibambwe hejuru y’imitwe yabyo.
ezekiyeli:1:23: 23.Munsi y’iryo juru amababa yabyo yari arambuye rimwe ryerekeye irindi, buri kimwe cyari gifite abiri atwikiriye uruhande rumwe, kandi buri kimwe gifite abiri atwikiriye urundi ruhande ku mibiri yabyo.
ezekiyeli:1:24: 24.Kandi ubwo byagendaga numvaga guhorera kw’amababa yabyo ari nko guhorera kw’amazi menshi, nk’ijwi ry’Ishoborabyose, urusaku rw’ikiriri rumeze nk’urusaku rw’ingabo. Iyo byahagararaga byabumbaga amababa yabyo.
ezekiyeli:1:25: 25.Kandi hejuru y’ikirere cyari hejuru y’imitwe yabyo hari ijwi, nuko byahagarara bikabumba amababa yabyo.
ezekiyeli:1:26: 26.Kandi hejuru y’ikirere cyari hejuru y’imitwe yabyo hari igisa n’intebe y’ubwami, isa n’ibuye rya safiro, kandi hejuru y’iyo ntebe y’ubwami hariho igisa n’umuntu.
ezekiyeli:1:27: 27.Uhereye mu rukenyerero rwacyo ukerekeza haruguru, mbona hafite ibara nk’iry’umuringa ukūbye, umuriro ukizingurije ku mubiri wacyo, kandi uhereye mu rukenyerero ugasubiza hepfo, nabonye hasa n’umuriro no mu mpande zacyo harabagirana.
ezekiyeli:1:28: 28.Uko umukororombya uba ku gicu ku munsi w’imvura uba umeze, ni ko kurabagirana kwari kuyigose kwasaga. Ibyo byari igishushanyo cy’ubwiza bw’Uwiteka. Nuko mbibonye ngwa nubamye, maze numva ijwi ry’uvuga.
ezekiyeli:2:1: Ezekiyeli atumwa ku Bisirayeli b’abagome1.Maze arambwira ati “Mwana w’umuntu, byuka uhagarare mvugane nawe.”
ezekiyeli:2:2: 2.Akivugana nanjye Umwuka anyinjiramo, anshingisha ibirenge byanjye maze numva uwavuganaga nanjye arambwira ati
ezekiyeli:2:3: 3.“Mwana w’umuntu, ngutumye ku Bisirayeli no ku mahanga yansuzuguye akangomera, bo na ba sekuruza bancumuyeho kugeza n’uyu munsi.
ezekiyeli:2:4: 4.Abana babo ni abashizi b’isoni b’imitima inangiwe, ni bo ngutumyeho maze uzababwire uti ‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.’
ezekiyeli:2:5: 5.Na bo nubwo bazumva naho batakumva (kuko ari inzu y’abagome), ariko rero bazamenya ko umuhanuzi yari abarimo.
ezekiyeli:2:6: 6.“Kandi nawe mwana w’umuntu we kubatinya, ntutinye n’amagambo yabo nubwo uri mu mifatangwe no mu mahwa, ukaba utuye muri sikorupiyo. We gutinya amagambo yabo, ntushishwe n’igitsure cyabo nubwo ari inzu y’abagome.
ezekiyeli:2:7: 7.Maze uzababwira amagambo yanjye nubwo bazumva naho batakumva, kuko ari abagome bikabije.
ezekiyeli:2:8: 8.“Ariko weho mwana w’umuntu, umva icyo nkubwira. We kuba umugome nk’iyo nzu y’abagome, bumbura akanwa kawe maze icyo nguha ukirye.”
ezekiyeli:2:9: 9.Nuko ndebye mbona ukuboko kunyerekeyeho, maze mbona gufite umuzingo w’igitabo. 10Akibumburira imbere yanjye kandi cyari cyanditsweho imbere n’inyuma, cyanditswemo amaganya n’umuborogo n’ibyago.
ezekiyeli:3:1: Imana imwihanangiriza kuburira abantu1.Maze arambwira ati “Mwana w’umuntu, icyo ubonye ukirye, urye uwo muzingo maze ugende ubwire inzu ya Isirayeli.”
ezekiyeli:3:2: 2.Nuko mbumbura akanwa angaburira uwo muzingo.
ezekiyeli:3:3: 3.Arambwira ati “Mwana w’umuntu, haza inda yawe, n’amara yawe uyuzuzemo uyu muzingo nguhaye.” Nuko mperako ndawurya, mu kanwa undyohera nk’ubuki.
ezekiyeli:3:4: 4.Maze arambwira ati “Mwana w’umuntu, genda ujye ku b’inzu ya Isirayeli ubabwire amagambo yanjye,
ezekiyeli:3:5: 5.kuko ntagutumye ku bantu b’ururimi rutamenyekana cyangwa rurushya, ahubwo ngutumye ku b’inzu ya Isirayeli.
ezekiyeli:3:6: 6.Si ku moko menshi avuga ururimi rutamenyekana cyangwa ururimi rurushya, abo mutumvikana. Ni ukuri, iyaba naragutumye kuri ba bandi baba barakumviye.
ezekiyeli:3:7: 7.Ariko ab’inzu ya Isirayeli ntibazakumvira kuko nanjye banga kunyumvira, kuko ab’inzu ya Isirayeli bose bazinze umunya kandi binangiye umutima.
ezekiyeli:3:8: 8.Dore ngiye gutuma mu maso hawe hakomera hagahangara mu maso habo, n’uruhanga rwawe nduhe gukomera ngo ruhangare impanga zabo.
ezekiyeli:3:9: 9.Uruhanga rwawe naruhaye gukomera nk’intosho rurusha isarabwayi, we kubatinya ngo ushishwe n’igitsure cyabo nubwo ari inzu y’abagome.”
ezekiyeli:3:10: 10.Maze arongera arambwira ati “Mwana w’umuntu, amagambo yanjye yose ngiye kukubwira uyakire mu mutima wawe, kandi uyumvishe amatwi yawe,
ezekiyeli:3:11: 11.maze ugende usange abo mu bwoko bwawe bajyanywe ari imbohe, uvugane na bo ubabwire uti ‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuze’, nubwo babyumva naho batabyumva.”
ezekiyeli:3:12: 12.Maze Umwuka aranterura, numva ijwi rihorera cyane rinturutse inyuma rivuga riti “Ubwiza bw’Uwiteka buherwe umugisha mu buturo bwe.”
ezekiyeli:3:13: 13.Kandi numva amababa y’ibizima ahorera, uko yakubitanaga n’umuhindo w’inziga zari iruhande rwabyo, ndetse n’ikiriri cy’urusaku rwinshi.
ezekiyeli:3:14: 14.Nuko Umwuka aranterura aranjyana, ngenda nshaririwe ndakaye cyane, ariko ukuboko k’Uwiteka kwari kunkomeje.
ezekiyeli:3:15: 15.Maze nsanga abajyanywe ari imbohe i Telabibu, bari batuye ku mugezi Kebari, nicara aho bari batuye mpamara iminsi irindwi numiwe nicaye hagati yabo.
ezekiyeli:3:16: Uwiteka agira Ezekiyeli umurinzi(Ezek 33.1-9)16.Nuko iminsi irindwi ishize, ijambo ry’Uwiteka rinzaho riti
ezekiyeli:3:17: 17.“Mwana w’umuntu, nakugize umurinzi w’inzu ya Isirayeli, nuko wumve ijambo ryo mu kanwa kanjye, ubumvishe ibyo mbaburira.
ezekiyeli:3:18: 18.Nimbwira umunyabyaha nti ‘Gupfa ko uzapfa’ nawe ntumuburire, cyangwa ngo uvugane n’umunyabyaha umwihanangiriza kuva mu nzira ye mbi ngo ukize ubugingo bwe, uwo munyabyaha azapfira mu byaha bye, ariko ni wowe nzabaza amaraso ye.
ezekiyeli:3:19: 19.Ariko nuburira umunyabyaha ntave mu byaha bye cyangwa mu nzira ye mbi, azapfira mu byaha bye, ariko weho uzaba ukijije ubugingo bwawe.
ezekiyeli:3:20: 20.“Kandi umukiranutsi nareka gukiranuka kwe agakora ibyo gukiranirwa, nzashyira igisitaza imbere ye kandi azapfa, kuko utamuburiye azapfira mu cyaha cye, kandi imirimo ye yo gukiranuka yakoze ntizibukwa ukundi, ariko ni wowe nzabaza amaraso ye.
ezekiyeli:3:21: 21.Ariko nuburira umukiranutsi kugira ngo adakora icyaha na we ntakore icyaha, ni ukuri azabaho kuko yemeye kuburirwa, kandi nawe uzaba urokoye ubugingo bwawe.”
ezekiyeli:3:22: 22.Aho ni ho ukuboko k’Uwiteka kwanziyeho maze arambwira ati “Haguruka ujye mu kibaya, ni ho ndi buvuganire nawe.”
ezekiyeli:3:23: 23.Mperako ndahaguruka njya mu kibaya, maze mbona ubwiza bw’Uwiteka buhari bumeze nk’ubwiza naboneye ku mugezi Kebari, maze ngwa nubamye.
ezekiyeli:3:24: 24.Umwuka anyinjiramo anshingisha ibirenge byanjye, maze avugana nanjye arambwira ati “Genda wikingiranire mu nzu yawe.
ezekiyeli:3:25: 25.Ariko rero mwana w’umuntu, dore bazagushyiraho iminyururu bayikuboheshe, kandi ntuzabasha gusohoka ngo ujye muri bo.
ezekiyeli:3:26: 26.Nzatuma ururimi rwawe rufatana n’urusenge rw’akanwa kawe, maze ube ikiragi we kubabera imbuzi, kuko abo ari inzu y’abagome.
ezekiyeli:3:27: 27.Ariko igihe nzavugana nawe nzabumbura akanwa kawe nawe uzababwire uti ‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo ushaka kumva niyumve, kandi udashaka kumva narorere’, kuko abo ari inzu y’abagome.”
ezekiyeli:4:1: Ashushanya i Yerusalemu uko hazagotwa n’abanzi1.Nuko nawe, mwana w’umuntu, wishakire ibumba rishashe urirambike imbere yawe, urishushanyeho umurwa ari wo Yerusalemu,
ezekiyeli:4:2: 2.maze uwugererezeho kandi uwukikizeho ibihome, uwurundeho ibyo kuririraho kandi uwugoteshe n’ingando, uwushingeho imigogo y’urwicundo yo gusenya inkike z’amabuye impande zose.
ezekiyeli:4:3: 3.Kandi wishakire icyuma gikarangwaho, ugishyirireho kukubera inkike y’icyuma hagati yawe n’umurwa, uwuhangeho amaso kandi uzawugoteshe ingerero. Ibyo bizabera inzu ya Isirayeli ikimenyetso.
ezekiyeli:4:4: 4.Maze kandi uryamire urubavu rwawe rw’ibumoso, urugerekeho igicumuro cy’inzu ya Isirayeli uko umubare w’iminsi uzaharyamira ungana, ni yo uzishyiraho igicumuro cyabo.
ezekiyeli:4:5: 5.Kuko imyaka y’igicumuro cyabo nayikunganirije n’umubare w’iminsi, ari yo minsi magana atatu na mirongo urwenda. Ni ko uzishyiraho igicumuro cy’inzu ya Isirayeli.
ezekiyeli:4:6: 6.Maze kandi nurangiza iyo, uzaryamire uruhande rwawe rw’iburyo wishyireho igicumuro cy’inzu ya Yuda, uhamare iminsi mirongo ine, umunsi wose nawukunganyirije n’umwaka umwe.
ezekiyeli:4:7: 7.Kandi uzerekeze amaso yawe kuri Yerusalemu hagoswe, ukuboko kwawe kwambaye ubusa, maze uhahanurire ibibi.
ezekiyeli:4:8: 8.Dore ngushyizeho imigozi kandi ntabwo uzahindura urundi rubavu, kugeza igihe iminsi yo kugota kwawe izaba irangiye.
ezekiyeli:4:9: 9.Wishakire n’ingano na sayiri, n’ibishyimbo n’inkunde n’amasaka n’amashaza, maze ubishyire mu nkono imwe ubicucume bibe inombe. Iminsi uzaryamira urubavu uko ari magana atatu na mirongo urwenda, ibyo ni byo bizagutunga.
ezekiyeli:4:10: 10.Kandi urugero rw’ibyokurya uzarya ni shekeli makumyabiri mu munsi, uzajye ubirya rimwe na rimwe.
ezekiyeli:4:11: 11.N’urugero rw’amazi uzajya unywa ni incuro ya gatandatu ya hini, na yo uzajye uyanywa rimwe na rimwe.
ezekiyeli:4:12: 12.Ibyo byokurya uzajye ubirya nk’imitsima ya sayiri, kandi uzajye ubitekeshereza amabyi y’abantu imbere yabo.
ezekiyeli:4:13: 13.Maze Uwiteka aravuga ati “Uko ni ko Abisirayeli bazarira ibyokurya byabo byandavuye mu banyamahanga, aho ngiye kubatataniriza.”
ezekiyeli:4:14: 14.Maze ndavuga nti “Yee baba we, Mwami Uwiteka! Dore ntabwo ubugingo bwanjye bwigeze guhumana, kuko uhereye mu buto bwanjye ukageza n’ubu ari ntabwo nigeze kurya intumbyi cyangwa icyatanyaguwe n’inyamaswa, kandi ntabwo inyama zanduye zigeze mu kanwa kanjye.”
ezekiyeli:4:15: 15.Maze arambwira ati “Dore amabyi y’abantu nyagukuyeho, nguhaye ibisheshe by’amase y’inka uzabe ari byo utekesha ibyokurya byawe.”
ezekiyeli:4:16: 16.Arongera arambwira ati “Mwana w’umuntu, dore umutsima ni wo rushingikirizo rw’ab’i Yerusalemu ngiye kurukuraho.Bazarya ibyokurya bagerewe bahagaritse umutima, kandi bazanywa amazi bagerewe bashishwa.
ezekiyeli:4:17: 17.Uko ni ko bazabura ibyokurya n’amazi, bose bazashoberwa babe ubutarutana, babe abayuku bazize igicumuro cyabo.”
ezekiyeli:5:1: Yerekanisha umusatsi we ibyago bizaba muri Yerusalemu1.Nuko rero mwana w’umuntu, wishakire inkota ityaye imeze nk’icyuma cyogosha, maze uyende uyinyuze ku mutwe wawe no mu bwanwa bwawe, maze wishakire iminzani yo gupimisha ubone kugabanya umusatsi.
ezekiyeli:5:2: 2.Kimwe cya gatatu cyawo uzagitwikire mu murwa hagati igihe iminsi yo kugota izaba irangiye, kandi uzende kimwe cya gatatu cyawo ugicagaguze inkota mu mpande zawo, na kimwe cya gatatu cyawo uzakinyanyagize mu muyaga, nanjye nzabikurikiza inkota.
ezekiyeli:5:3: 3.Uzahakure muke, uwupfunyike mu binyita by’umwambaro wawe,
ezekiyeli:5:4: 4.kandi uzende muke muri uwo uwujugunye mu muriro hagati ugurumane, ni ho umuriro uzaturuka ugere ku nzu ya Isirayeli yose.
ezekiyeli:5:5: 5.Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ati “Ngiyi Yerusalemu nahashyize hagati y’amahanga, no mu bihugu bihakikije.
ezekiyeli:5:6: 6.Ariko hagomeye amategeko yanjye hakora ibibi kurusha abanyamahanga, hakagomera amateka yanjye kurusha ibihugu bihakikije, kuko bahakanye amategeko yanjye n’amateka yanjye ntibayagenderemo.”
ezekiyeli:5:7: 7.Ni cyo gituma Umwami Uwiteka avuga ati “Kuko muri inkubaganyi kurusha abanyamahanga babakikije, kandi mukaba mutagendeye mu mateka yanjye, ntimukomeze n’amategeko yanjye cyangwa ngo mukurikize amategeko y’abanyamahanga babakikije.”
ezekiyeli:5:8: 8.Ni cyo gituma Umwami Uwiteka avuga ati “Dore jye ubwanjye ndakwibasiye, kandi nzagusohozaho ibihano abanyamahanga babireba.
ezekiyeli:5:9: 9.Nzagukoreramo icyo ntigeze gukora, ndetse ntazongera gukora n’ukundi nguhoye ibizira byawe byose.
ezekiyeli:5:10: 10.Ni cyo gituma ababyeyi bazakurīramo abahungu babo, kandi abahungu na bo bazarya ba se, nanjye nzaguciraho iteka, n’abawe bazaba barokotse bose nzabatataniriza mu birere byose.”
ezekiyeli:5:11: 11.Umwami Uwiteka aravuga ati “Ni ukuri ndirahiye, kuko wahumanishije ubuturo bwanjye bwera ibintu byawe byangwa urunuka n’ibizira byawe byose, ni cyo gituma nanjye ngiye kugutubya, ijisho ryanjye ntirizakureba neza kandi sinzakugirira ibambe.
ezekiyeli:5:12: 12.Kimwe cya gatatu cyawe kizicwa n’icyorezo, kandi inzara izabagutsemberamo. Kimwe cya gatatu kizicishirizwa inkota ahagukikije hose, na kimwe cya gatatu nzagitataniriza mu birere byose, mbakurikize inkota.
ezekiyeli:5:13: 13.“Uko ni ko umujinya wanjye uzasohozwa, kandi nzabamariraho uburakari bwanjye bukaze, mbone gushyitsa umutima mu nda. Bazamenya yuko jyewe Uwiteka navuganye ishyaka ryanjye, ubwo nzaba maze kubasohozaho uburakari bwanjye.
ezekiyeli:5:14: 14.Maze kandi nzaguhindura umusaka n’igitutsi mu banyamahanga bagukikije, imbere y’abahisi n’abagenzi bose.
ezekiyeli:5:15: 15.“Maze uzabere abanyamahanga bagukikije bose igitutsi n’incyuro n’akabarore n’igitangarirwa, ubwo nzaguciraho iteka mfite uburakari n’umujinya, ngucyahanye ubukana. Ni jye Uwiteka ubivuze.
ezekiyeli:5:16: 16.Ubwo nzabarasa imyambi mibi y’inzara yo kubarimbura, ni yo nzohereza kubatsembaho. Kandi nzabagwizamo inzara, n’ibyokurya ari byo rushingikirizo rwanyu nzaruvuna,
ezekiyeli:5:17: 17.kandi nzabateza inzara n’inyamaswa zikaze bikugire impfusha, icyorezo n’amaraso bizakunyuramo kandi nzakugabiza inkota. Ni jye Uwiteka ubivuze.”
ezekiyeli:6:1: 1.Maze ijambo ry’Uwiteka rinzaho riti
ezekiyeli:6:2: 2.“Mwana w’umuntu, erekeza amaso yawe ku misozi ya Isirayeli, maze uyihanurire ibibi uvuga uti
ezekiyeli:6:3: 3.‘Mwa misozi ya Isirayeli mwe, nimwumve ijambo ry’Umwami Uwiteka. Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka abwira imisozi n’udusozi, imigezi n’ibibaya ati: Dore jye ubwanjye ngiye kubagabiza inkota, ndimbure n’amasengero yanyu yo mu mpinga z’imisozi.
ezekiyeli:6:4: 4.Kandi ibicaniro byanyu bizahinduka ubusa, n’ibishushanyo byanyu by’izuba bizahombāna, kandi abantu banyu bishwe nzabahirikira imbere y’ibigirwamana byanyu.
ezekiyeli:6:5: 5.Nzarambika intumbi z’Abisirayeli imbere y’ibigirwamana byabo, kandi amagufwa yanyu nzayanyanyagiza iruhande rw’ibicaniro byanyu.
ezekiyeli:6:6: 6.Aho mutuye hose imidugudu izahinduka imisaka, kandi insengero zo mu mpinga z’imisozi na zo zizasenywa, kugira ngo ibicaniro byanyu bisenywe kandi bihinduke ubusa, n’ibigirwamana byanyu bimenagurwe bishireho, n’ibishushanyo by’izuba byanyu bitemagurwe kandi imirimo yanyu itsembwe.
ezekiyeli:6:7: 7.Nuko abishwe bazabagwamo, kandi muzamenya yuko ari jye Uwiteka.
ezekiyeli:6:8: 8.“ ‘Ariko nzagira abo ndokora, kugira ngo muzagire abacitse ku icumu mu banyamahanga, ubwo muzatatanirizwa mu bihugu.
ezekiyeli:6:9: 9.Kandi abacitse ku icumu bo muri mwe bazanyibukira mu banyamahanga, aho bazaba bajyanywe ari imbohe, bamenye uko namenaguwe n’imitima yabo irarikira yanyimūye, n’amaso yabo abenguka ibigirwamana byabo, kandi bazizinukwa babitewe n’ibibi bakoreye mu bizira byabo byose.
ezekiyeli:6:10: 10.Nuko bazamenya yuko ari jye Uwiteka kandi yuko iryo shyano nabateje ntarivugiye ubusa.’ ”
ezekiyeli:6:11: 11.Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ati “Kubita mu mashyi uhonde ikirenge hasi, maze uvuge uti ‘Mbega amahano y’ibizira bibi inzu y’Abisirayeli yakoze byose!’ Kuko bazarimbuzwa inkota n’inzara n’icyorezo.
ezekiyeli:6:12: 12.Uri kure azicwa n’icyorezo, n’uri hafi azicishwa inkota, kandi n’usigaye na we ari mu rukubo azicwa n’inzara. Uko ni ko nzabasohozaho uburakari bwanjye.
ezekiyeli:6:13: 13.Muzamenya yuko ari jye Uwiteka, ubwo abishwe babo bazaba barambaraye hagati y’ibigirwamana byabo iruhande rw’ibicaniro byabo, ku gasozi kose, no mu mpinga zose z’imisozi, no munsi y’igiti cy’umwera gitoshye cyose no munsi y’igiti kiyumbije cyose, aho bosererezaga ibigirwamana byabo byose ibihumura neza.
ezekiyeli:6:14: 14.Kandi nzabaramburira ukuboko kwanjye igihugu ngihindure umusaka n’ikidaturwa, uhereye mu butayu bw’aherekeye i Dibula no mu buturo bwabo bwose, na bo bazamenya ko ari jye Uwiteka.”
ezekiyeli:7:1: 1.Ijambo ry’Uwiteka ryongera kunzaho riti
ezekiyeli:7:2: 2.“Nawe mwana w’umuntu, uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka abwira igihugu cya Isirayeli uti ‘Amaherezo, amaherezo ageze mu mpande enye z’igihugu.
ezekiyeli:7:3: 3.“ ‘Noneho amaherezo akugezeho, ngiye kuguteza uburakari bwanjye, ngucire urubanza ruhwanye n’imigenzereze yawe, kandi nzakugaruraho ibizira byawe byose.
ezekiyeli:7:4: 4.Ijisho ryanjye ntirizakureba neza, kandi sinzakugirira ibambe, ahubwo nzakugaruraho ibihwanye n’imigenzereze yawe, kandi ibizira byawe bizakubonekaho. Muzamenya yuko ari jye Uwiteka.’ ”
ezekiyeli:7:5: 5.Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ati “Ikibi, ikibi kimwe gusa dore kiraje.
ezekiyeli:7:6: 6.Iherezo rirageze, amaherezo araje, biragukangukiye dore biragusohoreye.
ezekiyeli:7:7: 7.Igihano cyawe kikugezeho wa muturage wo mu gihugu we, igihe kirasohoye, umunsi uri hafi, umunsi w’imivurungano mu misozi, si uwo kuvuzwamo impundu.
ezekiyeli:7:8: 8.“Noneho ngiye kugusukaho umujinya wanjye ngusohozeho uburakari bwanjye, kandi ngucire urubanza ruhwanye n’imigenzereze yawe, nkugarureho ibihwanye n’ibizira byawe byose.
ezekiyeli:7:9: 9.Ijisho ryanjye ntirizakureba neza kandi sinzakugirira ibambe, ahubwo nzakugaruraho ibihwanye n’imigenzereze yawe, kandi ibizira byawe bizakubonekaho. Muzamenya yuko jye Uwiteka ari jye uhana.
ezekiyeli:7:10: 10.“Dore wa munsi nguyu uraje igihano cyawe kirasohoye, inkoni iragushibukiye ubwibone bukumezeho.
ezekiyeli:7:11: 11.Urugomo rurahagurutse, ni nk’inkoni ihana ibibi, nta wuzasigara muri bo, mu nteko zabo no mu butunzi bwabo nta kizahasigara, habe n’icyubahiro cyabo.
ezekiyeli:7:12: 12.“Igihe kirasohoye umunsi ugeze hafi, umuguzi ye kwishima, n’ugurwaho ye kuganya, kuko umujinya ugeze ku nteko zaho zose.
ezekiyeli:7:13: 13.Kuko ugurwaho atazasubira ku byaguzwe naho byaba bikiri aho, kuko iyerekwa ryerekeye ku nteko zaho zose, ritazahinduka ukundi, kandi nta wuzikomeza ari mu bibi, kandi akiriho.
ezekiyeli:7:14: 14.Impanda zirabahuruje ibintu byose barabiringaniza, ariko nta n’umwe wagiye mu ntambara kuko uburakari bwanjye buri ku nteko zaho zose.
ezekiyeli:7:15: 15.“Hanze hari inkota, kandi imbere hari icyorezo n’inzara: uri mu gasozi azicishwa inkota, na we uri mu murwa uzatsembwaho n’inzara n’icyorezo.
ezekiyeli:7:16: 16.Ariko abacitse ku icumu bazahungira mu misozi bameze nk’inuma zo mu bikombe, bose bazaba baganya umuntu wese aborozwa n’ibibi bye.
ezekiyeli:7:17: 17.Amaboko yose azatentebuka, n’intege zose zizacika zibe nk’amazi.
ezekiyeli:7:18: 18.Kandi bazakenyera ibigunira ibiteye ubwoba bibatwikire. Bose bazagira ipfunwe mu maso habo, kandi no ku mitwe yabo bose hazaba habaye inkomborera.
ezekiyeli:7:19: 19.Bazajugunya ifeza yabo mu nzira, n’izahabu yabo izababera nk’ikintu cyanduye. Ifeza yabo n’izahabu yabo ntabwo bizashobora kubarokora ku munsi w’uburakari bw’Uwiteka, ntabwo bizahaza ubugingo bwabo habe n’amara yabo, kuko byababereye igisitaza cyo kubagusha mu byaha.
ezekiyeli:7:20: 20.Ubwiza bw’ibyo yarimbanaga yabutakishaga ngo bugaragaze icyubahiro, ariko babiremamo ibishushanyo by’ibizira byabo n’ibintu byabo byangwa urunuka. Ni cyo gituma nabigize icyanduye.
ezekiyeli:7:21: 21.“Kandi nzabishyira mu maboko y’abanyamahanga ho iminyago, no mu y’abanyabyaha bo mu isi ho isahu, kandi bazabizirura.
ezekiyeli:7:22: 22.Nzabakuraho n’amaso yanjye, na bo bazazirura mu bwiherero bwanjye, kandi abambuzi bazahinjira bahazirure.
ezekiyeli:7:23: 23.“Uringanize iminyururu kuko igihugu cyuzuwemo n’ubwicanyi, n’umurwa ukaba wuzuwemo n’urugomo.
ezekiyeli:7:24: 24.Ni cyo gituma ngiye kuzana abo mu banyamahanga barushije abandi kuba babi bakigarurira amazu yabo, kandi nzatuma ubwibone bw’abakomeye babo bushiraho, n’ubuturo bwabo bwera buzazirurwa.
ezekiyeli:7:25: 25.Kurimbuka kuraje kandi bazashaka amahoro, ariko ntibazayabona.
ezekiyeli:7:26: 26.Ishyano rizasimburwa n’irindi shyano, n’inkuru mbi ikurikirwe n’iyindi mbi, kandi bazashakira iyerekwa ku muhanuzi, ariko umutambyi azabura itegeko n’abakuru babure inama.
ezekiyeli:7:27: 27.Umwami azaboroga n’igikomangoma kizuzurwamo n’amaganya, kandi amaboko y’abantu bo mu gihugu azadagadwa. Nzabagenza nk’uko imigenzereze yabo imeze mbacire urubanza rubakwiriye. Bazamenya yuko ari jye Uwiteka.”
ezekiyeli:8:1: Yerekwa uburyo Imana ifuha1.Nuko mu mwaka wa gatandatu, mu kwezi kwa gatandatu, ku munsi wa gatanu w’uko kwezi, nari nicaye mu nzu yanjye n’abakuru b’i Buyuda na bo bicaye imbere yanjye, maze ukuboko k’Umwami Uwiteka kungwiraho aho nari ndi.
ezekiyeli:8:2: 2.Nuko ndebye mbona ufite ishusho isa n’umuriro, uhereye ku rukenyerero rwe ugasubiza hepfo ari umuriro, kandi uhereye mu rukenyerero rwe ugasubiza haruguru hararabagiranaga, hafite ibara nk’iry’umuringa ukūbye.
ezekiyeli:8:3: 3.Maze arambura igisa n’ikiganza afata umusatsi wo ku mutwe wanjye, maze Umwuka aranterura angeza hagati y’ijuru n’isi anjyana i Yerusalemu ndi mu iyerekwa ry’Imana, angeza ku rugi rw’irembo ry’imbere ry’aherekeye ikasikazi, aho intebe y’igishushanyo gitera Imana gufuha yari iri.
ezekiyeli:8:4: 4.Nuko mbona ubwiza bw’Imana ya Isirayeli buhari, nk’uko nari nabwerekewe mu gisiza.
ezekiyeli:8:5: 5.Nuko arambwira ati “Mwana w’umuntu, noneho ubura amaso yawe urebe ahagana ikasikazi.” Mperako nubura amaso ndeba ahagana ikasikazi, maze mbona ikasikazi h’irembo ry’igicaniro cya gishushanyo gitera Imana gufuha kiri mu irembo.
ezekiyeli:8:6: 6.Maze arambaza ati “Mwana w’umuntu, mbese uruzi icyo bakora n’ibibi bikomeye ab’inzu ya Isirayeli bahakorera, bintera kujya kwigira kure y’ubuturo bwanjye bwera? Ariko uzongera kubona ibindi bizira bikomeye.”
ezekiyeli:8:7: 7.Nuko anjyana ku irembo ry’urugi, maze ndebye mbona icyuho mu nkike.
ezekiyeli:8:8: 8.Maze arambwira ati “Mwana w’umuntu, ngaho agūra icyo cyuho ku nkike.” Nuko maze kucyagura mbona urugi.
ezekiyeli:8:9: 9.Nuko arambwira ati “Kingura winjire urebe ibizira bibi bakoreramo.”
ezekiyeli:8:10: 10.Nuko ndinjira, maze ndebye mbona amoko yose y’ibyikurura hasi n’inyamaswa zishishana, n’ibigirwamana byose by’inzu ya Isirayeli, bishushanijwe ku rusika impande zose.
ezekiyeli:8:11: 11.Kandi imbere yabyo hahagaze abantu mirongo irindwi bo mu bakuru b’inzu ya Isirayeli, hagati yabo hahagaze Yāzaniya mwene Shafani, umuntu wese afite icyotero cye mu ntoki ze kandi hatama impumuro y’umwotsi w’imibavu.
ezekiyeli:8:12: 12.Maze arambaza ati “Mwana w’umuntu, mbese ubonye ibyo abakuru b’inzu ya Isirayeli bakorera mu mwijima, umuntu wese ibitekerezo bye abishushanyiriza ahameze nk’icyumba hiherereye? Kuko bavuga bati ‘Uwiteka ntaturuzi, Uwiteka yataye igihugu.’ ”
ezekiyeli:8:13: 13.Arongera arambwira ati “Uraza kubona ibindi bizira bikomeye bakora.”
ezekiyeli:8:14: 14.Maze anjyana ku rugi rw’irembo ry’inzu y’Uwiteka, ryerekeye ikasikazi, nuko mbona abagore bicaye baborogera Tamuzi.
ezekiyeli:8:15: 15.Maze arambaza ati “Mbese urabibonye wa mwana w’umuntu we? Uraza kubona ibindi bizira bikomeye biruta ibi.”
ezekiyeli:8:16: 16.Nuko aranjyana angeza mu rugo rw’imbere rw’inzu y’Uwiteka, maze ndebye mbona ku irembo ry’urusengero rw’Uwiteka hagati y’umuryango n’igicaniro, abantu bagera nko kuri makumyabiri na batanu bateye imigongo ku rusengero rw’Uwiteka bareba iburasirazuba, kandi basengaga izuba berekeye aho rirasira.
ezekiyeli:8:17: 17.Maze arambaza ati “Mbese ibyo urabibonye wa mwana w’umuntu we, ibyo bizira ab’inzu ya Yuda bakorera aha biraboroheye? Kuko igihugu bacyujujemo urugomo kandi bakongera kundakaza, ndetse bakaneguriza izuru.
ezekiyeli:8:18: 18.Ni cyo gituma nanjye nzabagirira uburakari, ijisho ryanjye ntirizabareba neza kandi sinzabagirira ibambe, nubwo bantakambira mu matwi bashyize ejuru ntabwo nzabumvira.”
ezekiyeli:9:1: Abantu b’Imana bashyirwa ikimenyetso mu ruhanga1.Maze arangururira mu matwi yanjye n’ijwi rirenga ati “Abahawe gutwara umurwa nimubigize hafi, umuntu wese afite intwaro yicana mu kuboko kwe.”
ezekiyeli:9:2: 2.Nuko mbona abantu batandatu baturutse mu nzira y’irembo ryo haruguru ryerekeye ikasikazi, umuntu wese afite intwaro yicana mu kuboko kwe. Kandi mbona undi muri bo yari yambaye imyambaro y’ibitare, afite ihembe ririmo wino ku itako rye, maze barinjira bahagarara iruhande rw’igicaniro cy’umuringa.
ezekiyeli:9:3: 3.Nuko basanga ubwiza bw’Imana ya Isirayeli bwavuye ku mukerubi aho bwahoze bugeze mu muryango w’inzu, maze ahamagara uwo muntu wari wambaye imyenda y’ibitare, afite ihembe ririmo wino ku itako rye.
ezekiyeli:9:4: 4.Nuko Uwiteka aramubwira ati “Genda unyure mu murwa, hagati muri Yerusalemu, maze ushyire ikimenyetso mu gahanga k’abantu banihira ibizira bihakorerwa byose bikabatakisha.”
ezekiyeli:9:5: 5.Ba bandi arababwira numva ati “Nimugende munyure mu murwa mumukurikiye maze mukubite, amaso yanyu ye kubabarira kandi mwe kugira ibambe,
ezekiyeli:9:6: 6.mutsembeho umusaza n’umusore n’inkumi, n’abana bato n’abagore, ariko umuntu wese ufite icyo kimenyetso mwe kumwakura, ndetse muhere mu buturo bwanjye bwera.” Nuko bahera kuri abo basaza bari imbere y’inzu.
ezekiyeli:9:7: 7.Kandi arababwira ati “Nimuhumanye inzu kandi ingombe zayo muzuzuzemo intumbi. Ngaho nimugende.” Nuko baragenda bica abo ku murwa.
ezekiyeli:9:8: 8.Nuko bakibica, aho nari nsigaye nikubita hasi nubamye ndataka nti “Ayii Mwami Uwiteka! Mbese uzarimbuza abasigaye ba Isirayeli uburakari bwawe ubusutse i Yerusalemu?”
ezekiyeli:9:9: 9.Maze arambwira ati “Ibibi by’inzu ya Isirayeli n’iya Yuda birakabije kandi igihugu cyuzuwemo n’amaraso, n’umurwa wuzuyemo imanza zigoretse kuko bavuga bati ‘Uwiteka yataye igihugu, kandi Uwiteka nta cyo areba.’
ezekiyeli:9:10: 10.Nanjye ijisho ryanjye ntirizabareba neza kandi sinzabagirira ibambe, ahubwo ibicumuro byabo nzabigereka ku mitwe yabo.”
ezekiyeli:9:11: 11.Nuko mbona wa muntu wambaye imyambaro y’ibitare, ufite ihembe ririmo wino ku itako rye agaruye ubutumwa ati “Nagenje uko wantegetse.”
ezekiyeli:10:1: Ubwiza bw’Imana buva ku rusengero1.Nuko ndareba maze mbona mu kirere cyari hejuru y’umutwe w’abakerubi, hari igisa n’ibuye rya safiro rimeze nk’intebe y’ubwami.
ezekiyeli:10:2: 2.Maze Uwiteka abwira uwambaye imyambaro y’ibitare ati “Genda ujye hagati y’inziga zikaraga munsi y’umukerubi, maze amashyi yawe yombi uyuzuzemo amakara y’ibishirira ukuye hagati y’abakerubi, uyanyanyagize hejuru y’umurwa.” Nuko ajyamo ndeba.
ezekiyeli:10:3: 3.Abakerubi bari bahagaze mu ruhande rw’iburyo rw’inzu igihe uwo muntu yinjiraga, maze igicu cyuzura mu gikari.
ezekiyeli:10:4: 4.Nuko ubwiza bw’Uwiteka burazamuka buva ku mukerubi buhagarara mu muryango w’inzu, maze inzu yuzuramo igicu, urugo na rwo rwuzuramo kurabagirana k’ubwiza bw’Uwiteka.
ezekiyeli:10:5: 5.Guhorera kw’amababa y’abakerubi kurumvikana kugera no mu rugo rw’ikambere, kumeze nk’ijwi ry’Imana Ishoborabyose iyo ivuze.
ezekiyeli:10:6: 6.Nuko Uwiteka amaze gutegeka uwo muntu wari wambaye imyambaro y’ibitare ati “Enda umuriro uri hagati y’inziga zikaraga hagati y’abakerubi”, aherako arinjira ahagarara iruhande rw’uruziga.
ezekiyeli:10:7: 7.Maze umukerubi arambura ukuboko kwe ari hagati y’abakerubi, yenda umuriro ubari hagati awushyira mu biganza by’uwo wari wambaye imyambaro y’ibitare, na we arawakira arasohoka.
ezekiyeli:10:8: 8.Nuko munsi y’amababa y’abakerubi haboneka igisa n’ikiganza cy’umuntu.
ezekiyeli:10:9: Ezekiyeli yongera kwerekwa bya bizima9.Maze ndebye mbona inziga enye ziri iruhande rw’abakerubi, uruziga rumwe ruri iruhande rw’umukerubi, urundi ruziga ruri iruhande rw’undi mukerubi, kandi izo nziga zasaga na tarushishi.
ezekiyeli:10:10: 10.Kandi uko zari zimeze uko ari enye zarasaga, bimeze nk’aho uruziga rumwe runyura mu rundi ruziga.
ezekiyeli:10:11: 11.Iyo zagendaga, zagendaga mu mpande zazo enye zikagenda zitagoragora, ahubwo aho umutwe wabaga werekeye ni ho zaromborezaga, zikagenda zitagoragora.
ezekiyeli:10:12: 12.Umubiri wabo wose n’imigongo yabo, n’amaboko yabo, n’amababa yabo, n’inziga bari bafite uko ari bane byari bifite amaso impande zose,
ezekiyeli:10:13: 13.izo nziga uko nabyumvise zitwaga inziga zikaraga.
ezekiyeli:10:14: 14.Kandi umwe umwe yari afite mu maso hane: mu maso hambere hari mu maso h’umukerubi, mu maso ha kabiri hari mu maso h’umuntu, mu maso ha gatatu hari mu maso h’intare, kandi mu maso ha kane hari mu maso h’igisiga.
ezekiyeli:10:15: 15.Maze abakerubi baratumbagira, ari bo cya kizima nari nabonye ku mugezi Kebari.
ezekiyeli:10:16: 16.Kandi iyo abakerubi bagendaga inziga zagendaga iruhande rwabo, iyo abakerubi baramburaga amababa yabo bagira ngo baguruke bave ku isi, inziga na zo ntizabavaga iruhande.
ezekiyeli:10:17: 17.Iyo bahagararaga na zo zarahagararaga, batumbagira zigatumbagirana na bo, kuko umwuka w’icyo kizima wari muri zo.
ezekiyeli:10:18: 18.Nuko ubwiza bw’Uwiteka buherako buva mu muryango w’inzu, buhagarara ku bakerubi.
ezekiyeli:10:19: 19.Maze abakerubi barambura amababa yabo batumbagira imbere yanjye bava mu isi, kandi n’inziga zari iruhande rwabo, maze bahagarara ku rugi rw’irembo ry’inzu y’Uwiteka ryerekeye iburasirazuba, kandi ubwiza bw’Imana ya Isirayeli bwari hejuru yabo.
ezekiyeli:10:20: 20.Abo ni bo cya kizima nabonye kiri munsi y’Imana ya Isirayeli ku mugezi Kebari, maze menya yuko ari abakerubi.
ezekiyeli:10:21: 21.Umwe umwe yari afite mu maso hane, kandi umwe umwe afite amababa ane n’ibisa n’ibiganza by’umuntu biri munsi y’amababa yabo.
ezekiyeli:10:22: 22.Kandi uko mu maso habo hasaga, n’ishusho yabo, na bo ubwabo ni byo nabonye ku mugezi Kebari, bakagenda umwe umwe aromboreje imbere ye.
ezekiyeli:11:1: Imana isezeranya Abisirayeli baciwe ko izababera ubuturo1.Nuko Umwuka yongera kunterura anjyana ku irembo ry’inzu y’Uwiteka ryerekeye iburasirazuba. Nuko mbona abantu makumyabiri na batanu ku rugi rw’irembo, maze mbabonamo Yāzaniya mwene Azuri na Pelatiya mwene Benaya, ibikomangoma by’ubwoko.
ezekiyeli:11:2: 2.Maze arambwira ati “Mwana w’umuntu, abo ni abantu bagambirira ibibi, kandi bakagira abo muri uyu murwa inama mbi
ezekiyeli:11:3: 3.bavuga bati ‘Mbese igihe cyo kubaka amazu nticyegereje? Uyu murwa ni inkono ivuga, natwe turi inyama.’
ezekiyeli:11:4: 4.Nuko rero ubahanurire ibibi mwana w’umuntu, uhanure.”
ezekiyeli:11:5: 5.Maze Umwuka w’Uwiteka anzaho arambwira, ati “Vuga uti ‘Uwiteka yavuze ngo ibyo ni byo mwavuze mwa b’inzu ya Isirayeli mwe, kuko nzi ibyo mwibwira.
ezekiyeli:11:6: 6.Mwakabije kwica abantu banyu muri uyu murwa, inzira zaho muzigwizamo intumbi.’
ezekiyeli:11:7: 7.“Ni cyo gituma Umwami Uwiteka avuga ati ‘Abanyu mwishe mugahirika intumbi muri uyu murwa ni bo nyama, na wo uyu murwa ni wo nkono ivuga, ariko mweho muzawusohorwamo.
ezekiyeli:11:8: 8.Mwatinye inkota ariko nzabagabiza inkota, byavuzwe n’Umwami Uwiteka.
ezekiyeli:11:9: 9.Kandi nzawubasohoramo mbatange mu maboko y’abanyamahanga, maze mbashyireho ibihano.
ezekiyeli:11:10: 10.Muzagushwa n’inkota, nzabacira urubanza ndi mu rugabano rwa Isirayeli, kandi muzamenya yuko ndi Uwiteka.
ezekiyeli:11:11: 11.Uyu murwa ntuzababera inkono ivuga, kandi namwe ntimuzaba inyama zo muri yo, nzabacira urubanza ndi mu rugabano rwa Isirayeli, namwe muzamenya yuko ndi Uwiteka
ezekiyeli:11:12: 12.kuko mutagendeye mu mategeko yanjye ntimusohoze n’amateka yanjye, ahubwo mwakurikije amategeko y’abanyamahanga babakikijeho.’ ”
ezekiyeli:11:13: 13.Nuko ngihanura, Pelatiya mwene Benaya aherako arapfa. Maze nikubita hasi nubamye ntera ijwi hejuru nti “Ayii Mwami Uwiteka! Mbese ugiye gutsembaho rwose abasigaye ba Isirayeli?”
ezekiyeli:11:14: 14.Maze ijambo ry’Uwiteka rinzaho riti
ezekiyeli:11:15: 15.“Mwana w’umuntu, bene wanyu muva inda imwe n’inzu yose ya Isirayeli, abo bose ni bo abaturage b’i Yerusalemu babwiye bati ‘Nimwimūre Uwiteka, ni twe twahawe iki gihugu ho umwandu.’
ezekiyeli:11:16: 16.“Nuko rero uvuge uti ‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuze ngo: Ubwo nabimuriye kure mu banyamahanga, nkabatataniriza mu bihugu byose, ariko nzamara umwanya muto mbabereye ubuturo bwera mu bihugu batataniyemo.’
ezekiyeli:11:17: 17.“Noneho uvuge uti ‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuze ngo: Nzabakoranya mbavane mu mahanga, kandi mbateranirize hamwe mbakuye mu bihugu aho mwari mwaratataniye, maze mbahe igihugu cya Isirayeli.
ezekiyeli:11:18: 18.Kandi bazahaza bahakure ibintu byabo bishishana byose, n’ibizira byaho byose.
ezekiyeli:11:19: 19.Nanjye nzabaha umutima uhuye kandi mbashyiremo umwuka mushya, umutima w’ibuye nzawukura mu mubiri wabo mbahe umutima woroshye,
ezekiyeli:11:20: 20.kugira ngo bagendere mu mategeko yanjye, bakomeze amateka yanjye kandi bayasohoze, na bo bazaba ubwoko bwanjye nanjye mbe Imana yabo.
ezekiyeli:11:21: 21.Ariko abo bafite umutima ukurikira ibyabo nanga urunuka n’ibizira byabo, iyo nzira yabo mbi nzayibagereka ku mutwe.’ ” Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:11:22: 22.Maze abakerubi barambura amababa yabo, n’inziga zari iruhande rwabo; kandi ubwiza bw’Imana ya Isirayeli buri hejuru yabo.
ezekiyeli:11:23: 23.Nuko ubwiza bw’Uwiteka burazamuka buva mu murwa hagati, buhagarara ku musozi uri mu ruhande rw’iburasirazuba rw’umurwa.
ezekiyeli:11:24: 24.Maze Umwuka aranterura anjyana mu Bukaludaya ku bajyanywe ari imbohe, ndi mu iyerekwa ku bw’Umwuka w’Imana. Maze iyerekwa nabonye riherako rimvaho.
ezekiyeli:11:25: 25.Nuko mbwira abajyanywe ari imbohe ibyo neretswe n’Uwiteka byose.
ezekiyeli:12:1: Umuhanuzi abera abantu ikimenyetso1.Ijambo ry’Uwiteka ryongera kunzaho riti
ezekiyeli:12:2: 2.“Mwana w’umuntu, uturana n’ab’inzu y’abagome bafite amaso yo kureba ntibabone, bafite amatwi yo kumva ntibumve, kuko ari ab’inzu y’abagome.
ezekiyeli:12:3: 3.“Nuko rero weho mwana w’umuntu, wegeranye ibintu bibaga byo kwimukana, maze wimuke ku manywa bakureba. Uzimuke uve iwawe ujye ahandi bakureba, ahari bizabatera gutekereza nubwo ari ab’inzu y’abagome.
ezekiyeli:12:4: 4.Kandi uzasohore ibintu byawe nk’ibintu byo kwimukana ku manywa bakureba, nawe uzasohoke nimugoroba bakureba nk’abahagurutse baciwe.
ezekiyeli:12:5: 5.Wicire icyuho bakureba, ube ari cyo ubimenesherezamo.
ezekiyeli:12:6: 6.Maze uzabishyire ku rutugu bakuruzi, ubijyane hatabona, uzitwikire mu maso kugira ngo utareba igihugu, kuko nagushyiriyeho kubera inzu ya Isirayeli ikimenyetso.”
ezekiyeli:12:7: 7.Nuko nkora uko nategetswe: ibintu byanjye mbisohora ku manywa nk’ibyimukanwa, maze ku gicamunsi nca icyuho mu nkike ubwanjye mbisohora hatabona, mbishyira ku rutugu bandeba.
ezekiyeli:12:8: 8.Bukeye bwaho ijambo ry’Uwiteka rinzaho riti
ezekiyeli:12:9: 9.“Mwana w’umuntu, mbese ab’inzu ya Isirayeli, ya nzu y’abagome ntibakubajije bati ‘Uragira ibiki?’
ezekiyeli:12:10: 10.Ubasubize uti ‘Umwami Uwiteka aravuga ngo: Ubwo buhanuzi buhanurira umwami uri i Yerusalemu, n’ab’inzu ya Isirayeli bahari bose.’
ezekiyeli:12:11: 11.Uvuge uti ‘Mbabereye ikimenyetso.’ Uko nagenje ni ko bazagenzerezwa, bazimurwa bajyanwe ari imbohe.
ezekiyeli:12:12: 12.Kandi umwami ubarimo azashyira ibintu ku rutugu hatabona maze ahaguruke, bazicira icyuho mu nkike babe ari cyo babimenesherezamo, azitwikira mu maso kuko atazarebesha igihugu amaso ye.
ezekiyeli:12:13: 13.Kandi nzamutega ikigoyi cyanjye, afatwe n’umutego wanjye nzamujyane i Babuloni mu gihugu cy’Abakaludaya, kandi ntazahareba nubwo ari ho azagwa.
ezekiyeli:12:14: 14.Kandi abamukikijeho bose bo kumutabara, n’imitwe y’ingabo ze zose, nzabatataniriza mu birere byose mbakurikize inkota.
ezekiyeli:12:15: 15.“Na bo bazamenya yuko ndi Uwiteka, igihe nzabatataniriza mu mahanga nkabateragana mu bihugu.
ezekiyeli:12:16: 16.Ariko nzasiga bake muri bo mbarokore inkota n’inzara n’icyorezo, kugira ngo bagaragarize ibizira byabo byose mu mahanga aho bagiye, kandi bazamenya yuko ndi Uwiteka.”
ezekiyeli:12:17: 17.Ijambo ry’Uwiteka ryongera kunzaho riti
ezekiyeli:12:18: 18.“Mwana w’umuntu, ibyokurya byawe ubirye uhinda umushyitsi, kandi unywe amazi yawe udagadwa uhagaritse umutima,
ezekiyeli:12:19: 19.maze ubwire abantu bo mu gihugu uti ‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga iby’abaturage b’i Yerusalemu, n’iby’abo mu gihugu cya Isirayeli ngo: Bazarya ibyokurya byabo bahagaritse imitima, kandi banywe amazi yabo bashobewe kuko igihugu kizaba gihindutse umusaka, n’ibyari bikirimo byose bikaba bisahuwe bazize urugomo rw’abagituyemo bose.
ezekiyeli:12:20: 20.Kandi imidugudu ituwemo izahindurwa ikidaturwa, igihugu na cyo kizahinduka umusaka maze muzamenya yuko ndi Uwiteka.’ ”
ezekiyeli:12:21: 21.Nuko ijambo ry’Uwiteka rinzaho riti
ezekiyeli:12:22: 22.“Mwana w’umuntu, uyu mugani ucibwa mu gihugu cya Isirayeli usobanurwa ute ngo iminsi iratinze, kandi iyerekwa ryose rirahebwe?
ezekiyeli:12:23: 23.Noneho ubabwire uti ‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Nzatuma uwo mugani utongera gucibwa, kandi ntibazongera kuwuvuga muri Isirayeli.’ Ahubwo ubabwire uti ‘Iminsi igeze hafi, n’iyerekwa ryose rigiye gusohozwa.
ezekiyeli:12:24: 24.Nta yerekwa ry’ibinyoma cyangwa ubupfumu bwo kwihakirizwa, bizongera kuba mu nzu ya Isirayeli.
ezekiyeli:12:25: 25.Kuko ndi Uwiteka nzavuga, kandi ijambo nzavuga rizasohora. Ntabwo rizongera kurazikwa, kuko mu minsi yanyu mwa ab’inzu y’ubugome mwe, nzavuga kandi nzasohoza icyo navuze.’ ” Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:12:26: 26.Ijambo ry’Uwiteka ryongera kunzaho riti
ezekiyeli:12:27: 27.“Mwana w’umuntu, dore ab’inzu ya Isirayeli baravuga bati ‘Iyerekwa yabonye rizasohora bishyize kera, kandi ahanura ibihe bikiri kure cyane.’
ezekiyeli:12:28: 28.Nuko rero ubabwire uti ‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Amagambo yanjye yose nta na rimwe rizongera kurazikwa, ahubwo ijambo nzavuga rizasohora.’ ” Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:13:1: Abahanuzi b’ibinyoma bavugwa1.Maze ijambo ry’Uwiteka rinzaho riti
ezekiyeli:13:2: 2.“Mwana w’umuntu, uhanurire abahanuzi ba Isirayeli bahanura, kandi ubwire abajya bahanura ibyo bibwira mu mitima yabo ubwabo uti
ezekiyeli:13:3: 3.‘Nimwumve ijambo ry’Uwiteka. Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Bazabona ishyano ba bahanuzi b’abapfapfa, bakurikiza ibyo bibwira kandi ari nta cyo beretswe.’
ezekiyeli:13:4: 4.Yewe Isirayeli we, abahanuzi bawe bameze nk’ingunzu zo mu kidaturwa.
ezekiyeli:13:5: 5.Ntimurakazamuka ngo mujye mu byuho byo mu rugo rw’inzu ya Isirayeli, habe no kubiziba ngo mubone uko muhagarara mu ntambara ku munsi w’Uwiteka.
ezekiyeli:13:6: 6.Babonye iyerekwa ry’ubusa n’ubupfumu bw’ibinyoma, kandi baravuga bati ‘Ni ko Uwiteka avuga.’ Nyamara Uwiteka atari we wabatumye, ariko bemeza abantu kwiringira ko ijambo ryabo rizasohora.
ezekiyeli:13:7: 7.Mbese iyerekwa mwabonye si iry’ubusa, ubupfumu mwavuze si ubw’ibinyoma, ubwo muvuga muti ‘Uwiteka yavuze’, kandi ari nta cyo navuze?”
ezekiyeli:13:8: 8.Ni cyo gituma Umwami Uwiteka avuga ati “Kuko mwavuze ibitagira umumaro, mukabona ibinyoma, nuko dore ndabibasiye. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:13:9: 9.Kandi ukuboko kwanjye kuzibasira abahanuzi babona iyerekwa ritagize icyo rimaze, bagahanura ibinyoma. Ntabwo bazaba mu nama y’ubwoko bwanjye, kandi ntabwo bazandikwa mu gitabo cy’inzu ya Isirayeli, habe no kwinjira mu gihugu cya Isirayeli, namwe muzamenya ko ndi Umwami Uwiteka.
ezekiyeli:13:10: 10.“Ni ukuri bashutse ubwoko bwanjye bavuga ngo ‘Ni amahoro’ kandi ari nta yo, kandi iyo hagize uwubaka inkike bayihomesha ishwagara ridakomeye.
ezekiyeli:13:11: 11.Nuko ubwire abayihomesha ishwagara ridakomeye yuko iyo nkike izariduka. Hazagwa imvura y’umurindi, namwe mahindu y’urubura rukomeye muzagwa, maze umuyaga w’umugaru uyisenye.
ezekiyeli:13:12: 12.Dore inkike nigwa, ntimuzi ko muzanegurwa ngo mbese guhoma mwayihomesheje kwagiye he?”
ezekiyeli:13:13: 13.Ni cyo gituma Umwami Uwiteka avuga ati “Nzayisenyesha umuyaga w’umugaru mfite uburakari, hazagwa imvura y’umurindi bitewe n’umujinya wanjye, kandi uburakari bwanjye bukaze buzatuma urubura rukomeye ruyitsembaho.
ezekiyeli:13:14: 14.Ni ko nzasenya inkike mwahomesheje ishwagara ridakomeye, maze nyigushe hasi bitume urufatiro rwayo rutwikururwa. Izagwa namwe mutsemberwemo, kandi muzamenya yuko ndi Uwiteka.
ezekiyeli:13:15: 15.“Uku ni ko nzasohoza uburakari bwanjye ku nkike no ku bayihomesheje ishwagara ridakomeye, kandi nzababwira nti ‘Inkike ntikiriho ndetse n’abayihomye,
ezekiyeli:13:16: 16.ari bo bahanuzi ba Isirayeli bahanura iby’i Yerusalemu, bakayibonera iyerekwa ry’amahoro kandi ari nta mahoro.’ Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:13:17: 17.“Nuko nawe mwana w’umuntu, urebeshe abakobwa b’ubwoko bwawe igitsure, bahanura ibyo bibwiye mu mitima yabo, maze ubahanurire uti
ezekiyeli:13:18: 18.‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Bazabona ishyano abo bagore bagegena impigi zo kwambika bose mu bizigira, bakabadodera ibitambaro byo gutwikira imitwe yabo, uko umuntu areshya wese kugira ngo bahige ubugingo bwabo! Mbese abantu banjye murahiga ubugingo bwabo ngo mubukize ku bwanyu?
ezekiyeli:13:19: 19.Kandi mwangayishije mu bwoko bwanjye ku bw’ingemu z’amashyi ya sayiri n’intore z’umutsima, kugira ngo mwice ubugingo butari bukwiriye gupfa, murokore ubugingo butari bukwiriye kurokorwa, mu buryo bushuka ubwoko bwanjye butegera amatwi ibinyoma.’ ”
ezekiyeli:13:20: 20.Ni cyo gituma Umwami Uwiteka avuga ati “Dore nibasiye impigi zanyu, izo mutegesha abantu nk’uko nyoni zitegwa. Nzazishikuza ku maboko yanyu maze ndeke ubugingo bw’abantu bwigendere, ubwo bugingo bw’abantu mutega nk’uko inyoni zitegwa.
ezekiyeli:13:21: 21.Ibitambaro byanyu na byo nzabishwanyaguza nkure ubwoko bwanjye mu maboko yanyu, kandi ntabwo bazongera kuba mu maboko yanyu ngo bahigwe, namwe muzamenya yuko ndi Uwiteka.
ezekiyeli:13:22: 22.“Kuko ibinyoma byanyu ari byo mwateje umutima w’ubukiranutsi agahinda, uwo ntateye agahinda, mugakomeza amaboko y’inkozi y’ibibi kugira ngo idahindukira ikava mu nzira yayo mbi ikabaho,
ezekiyeli:13:23: 23.ni cyo gituma mutazongera kubona ibyerekanwa by’ubusa cyangwa kuragura ibinyoma, kandi nzarokora ubwoko bwanjye mbuvane mu maboko yanyu, namwe muzamenya yuko ndi Uwiteka.”
ezekiyeli:14:1: 1.Maze bamwe bo mu bakuru ba Isirayeli baza aho ndi, banyicara imbere.
ezekiyeli:14:2: 2.Nuko ijambo ry’Uwiteka rinzaho riti
ezekiyeli:14:3: 3.“Mwana w’umuntu, abo bantu bazanye ibigirwamana byabo bakabigira no mu mitima, kandi ikibi kibagusha bagishyize imbere yabo. Mbese birakwiriye ko bariya bagira icyo bampanuza?
ezekiyeli:14:4: 4.“Nuko rero uvugane nabo ubabwire uti ‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Umuntu wese wo mu nzu ya Isirayeli uzanye ibigirwamana bye akabigira no mu mutima, kandi ikibi kimugusha akagishyira imbere ye agasanga umuhanuzi, jye Uwiteka nzamusubiza muri byo nkurikije umubare w’ibigirwamana bye,
ezekiyeli:14:5: 5.kugira ngo ab’inzu ya Isirayeli mbafatane ibiri mu mitima yabo, kuko bose banyimūye babitewe n’ibigirwamana byabo.’
ezekiyeli:14:6: 6.“Nuko ubwire ab’inzu ya Isirayeli uti ‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Nimugaruke mwimūre ibigirwamana byanyu, mukure amaso yanyu ku bizira byanyu byose.
ezekiyeli:14:7: 7.“ ‘Kuko umuntu wese wo mu nzu ya Isirayeli, cyangwa umushyitsi uzindukiye muri bo akanyimūra, akazana n’ibigirwamana bye akabigira no mu mutima we, kandi agashyira ikibi kimugusha imbere ye agasanga umuhanuzi ngo amumpanurize, jye Uwiteka ni jye uzamwisubiriza.
ezekiyeli:14:8: 8.Kandi amaso yanjye nzayahoza kuri uwo muntu, mugire igitangaza n’ikitegerezo n’iciro ry’umugani kandi nzamuca mu bwoko bwanjye, namwe muzamenya yuko ndi Uwiteka.
ezekiyeli:14:9: 9.“ ‘Umuhanuzi nashukwa akagira ijambo avuga, jye Uwiteka ni jye uzaba umwishukiye, kandi nzamuramburiraho ukuboko kwanjye, murimbure ave mu bwoko bwanjye Isirayeli.
ezekiyeli:14:10: 10.Na bo bazajyana n’ibibi byabo: ibibi by’umuhanuzi bizahwana n’ibibi by’umumpanuriza,
ezekiyeli:14:11: 11.kugira ngo inzu ya Isirayeli itazongera kunyoba ngo inyimūre, cyangwa ngo yongere yiyanduze ibicumuro byabo byose, ahubwo babe ubwoko bwanjye nanjye mbe Imana yabo.’ ” Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:14:12: 12.Maze ijambo ry’Uwiteka rinzaho riti
ezekiyeli:14:13: 13.“Mwana w’umuntu, igihugu nikinkorera icyaha kigacumura, nanjye nkakiramburaho ukuboko kwanjye ngakuraho urushingikirizo rw’umutsima, maze nkagiteza inzara nkagitsembamo abantu n’amatungo,
ezekiyeli:14:14: 14.naho cyaba kirimo abo bantu batatu, Nowa, Daniyeli na Yobu, gukiranuka kwabo kwakiza ubwabo bugingo gusa. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:14:15: 15.“Iyo nteje igihugu inyamaswa zikacyangiza kigahinduka amatongo, inyamaswa ntizikunde ko hari ugicamo,
ezekiyeli:14:16: 16.naho cyaba kirimo abo bantu batatu, ndirahiye ko batagira icyo barokora ari abahungu cyangwa ari abakobwa, ni bo barokoka bonyine ariko igihugu cyaba umusaka. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:14:17: 17.“Cyangwa se icyo gihugu ngiteje inkota nkavuga nti ‘Wa nkota we, nyura mu gihugu’ kugira ngo ntsembeho abantu n’amatungo,
ezekiyeli:14:18: 18.naho cyaba kirimo abo bantu batatu, ndirahiye ko batagira icyo barokora ari abahungu cyangwa abakobwa, ubwabo bonyine ni bo barokoka.
ezekiyeli:14:19: 19.“Cyangwa se nateza icyorezo muri icyo gihugu, nkakibavushirizamo amaraso ku bw’umujinya banteye, nkagicamo abantu n’amatungo,
ezekiyeli:14:20: 20.naho Nowa na Daniyeli na Yobu baba bakirimo, ndirahiye ko batagira icyo barokora ari umuhungu cyangwa umukobwa, gukiranuka kwabo kwakiza ubwabo bugingo gusa.” Ni ko Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:14:21: 21.Umwami Uwiteka aravuga ati “Mbese sinarushaho guhana i Yerusalemu ubwo nzahateza ibihano byanjye bikomeye uko ari bine, ari byo inkota n’inzara, n’inyamaswa z’inkazi n’icyorezo, kugira ngo ngitsembemo abantu n’amatungo?
ezekiyeli:14:22: 22.Ariko dore hazasigara abarokotse bazayisohorwamo, abahungu n’abakobwa. Dore bazabasanga, namwe muzabona ingeso zabo n’imirimo yabo, mushire agahinda k’ibibi byose nzaba nateye i Yerusalemu.
ezekiyeli:14:23: 23.Nuko bazabahumuriza ubwo muzabona ingeso zabo n’imirimo yabo, ni bwo muzamenya ko ibyo nayikoreye byose ntabikoreye ubusa.” Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:15:1: I Yerusalemu hagereranywa n’umuzabibu1.Maze ijambo ry’Uwiteka rinzaho riti
ezekiyeli:15:2: 2.“Mwana w’umuntu, igiti cy’umuzabibu ndetse n’amashami yacyo birusha iki ibindi biti byo mu kibira?
ezekiyeli:15:3: 3.Mbese hari uwagishakamo ibisate ngo abikoreshe? Cyangwa se umuntu yakibazamo agati ko kumanikaho ikintu?
ezekiyeli:15:4: 4.Dore bagitaye mu muriro nk’inkwi, umutwe wacyo n’ikibuno cyacyo birashirira, kandi hagati yacyo na ho harashya. Mbese cyagira icyo kimara?
ezekiyeli:15:5: 5.Dore kikiriho nta cyo cyamaze, nkanswe ubu umuriro umaze kugitwika kigashya. Hari icyo cyamara?”
ezekiyeli:15:6: 6.Ni cyo gituma Uwiteka avuga ati “Uko umuzabibu umeze mu biti byo mu kibira, uwo natanzeho inkwi, ni ko nzatanga abaturage b’i Yerusalemu.
ezekiyeli:15:7: 7.Kandi nzabarindisha igitsure, nibasohoka bavuye mu muriro bazagwa mu wundi, kandi namwe muzamenya yuko ndi Uwiteka, ubwo nzabarindisha igitsure.
ezekiyeli:15:8: 8.Kandi igihugu nzakigira amatongo kuko bacumuye.” Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:16:1: I Yerusalemu hagereranywa n’umugore wabaye maraya1.Ijambo ry’Uwiteka ryongera kunzaho riti
ezekiyeli:16:2: 2.“Mwana w’umuntu, menyesha i Yerusalemu ibizira byaho
ezekiyeli:16:3: 3.uvuge uti ‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka abwira ab’i Yerusalemu: Inkomoko yawe na kavukire yawe, uri uwo mu gihugu cy’i Kanāni. So yari Umwamori na we nyoko yari Umuhetikazi.
ezekiyeli:16:4: 4.Kavukire yawe, umunsi wavutseho umukungwe wawe ntibawushariye, kandi ntibakujabuye n’amazi ngo ubonere. Ntabwo waruhije usigwa n’akamuri, habe no kugushyira mu twahi tw’impinja.
ezekiyeli:16:5: 5.Nta wakurebanye imbabazi kugira ngo agukoreho ibyo akugiriye ibambe, ahubwo watawe ku gasozi ku munsi wavutseho kuko wagawaga.
ezekiyeli:16:6: 6.“‘Nuko nkunyuzeho mbona wigaragura mu ivata ryawe ndakubwira nti “Nubwo uri mu ivata ryawe ubeho.” Ni ukuri narakubwiye nti “Nubwo uri mu ivata ryawe ubeho.”
ezekiyeli:16:7: 7.Nakugwije nk’ibimera mu murima uragwira kandi urakura, ugira uburanga buhebuje. Amabere yawe arashimangira n’umusatsi wawe urakura, ariko wari waratawe ari nta cyo wambaye.
ezekiyeli:16:8: 8.“ ‘Nuko nkunyuzeho ndakwitegereza mbona ugeze mu gihe cyo kubengukwa, maze ngutwikiriza umwitero wanjye nambika ubwambure bwawe, ndetse narakurahiye nsezerana nawe, maze uba uwanjye. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:16:9: 9.“‘Mperako nkuhagiza amazi, ni ukuri nkuhagiraho amaraso yawe rwose kandi nguhezuza amavuta.
ezekiyeli:16:10: 10.Maze nkwambika imyambaro ifite amabara ateye ibika, ngukwetesha inkweto z’impu za tahashi, ngukenyeza imyambaro y’ibitare myiza kandi ngutwikiriza iya hariri.
ezekiyeli:16:11: 11.Nkurimbishisha iby’umurimbo kandi nkwambika ibitare by’izahabu ku maboko, n’umukufi mu ijosi ryawe.
ezekiyeli:16:12: 12.Kandi nshyira impeta ku zuru ryawe n’impeta zo ku matwi, n’ikamba ryiza ku mutwe wawe.
ezekiyeli:16:13: 13.Uko ni ko warimbishishijwe izahabu n’ifeza, kandi imyambaro yawe yari ibitare byiza, na hariri n’amabara ateye ibika. Wajyaga urya iby’ifu y’ingezi n’ubuki n’amavuta ya elayo, kandi wari ufite uburanga buhebuje, urahirwa ndetse umera nk’umwamikazi.
ezekiyeli:16:14: 14.Maze kwamamara kwawe kugera mu mahanga bitewe n’ubwiza bwawe kuko bwari buhebuje, bwunguwe n’icyubahiro cyanjye naguhaye. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:16:15: 15.“‘Ariko wiringiye ubwiza bwawe maze usambana ubitewe no kogezwa kwawe, ubusambanyi bwawe ubuha abahisi bose uba uwabo.
ezekiyeli:16:16: 16.Nuko wenda mu myambaro yawe kandi wiremera insengero zo mu mpinga z’imisozi, uzirimbishisha amabara atari amwe maze uzisambaniramo. Nta bimeze nk’ibyo bizaba, ngo bimere bityo.
ezekiyeli:16:17: 17.Kandi wajyanye impeta zawe nziza z’izahabu yanjye n’ifeza yanjye, ibyo naguhaye, ubyiremeramo ibishushanyo by’abagabo ngo usambane na bo,
ezekiyeli:16:18: 18.kandi wajyanye imyambaro yawe y’amabara ateye ibika urayibyambika, maze utereka imbere yabyo amavuta yanjye ya elayo n’imibavu yanjye.
ezekiyeli:16:19: 19.Ndetse n’ibyokurya byanjye naguhaye, iby’ifu y’ingezi n’amavuta ya elayo n’ubuki, ibyo nakugaburiraga wabiteretse imbere yabo ngo bibabere ibihumura neza, uko ni ko byagenze. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:16:20: 20.“ ‘Maze kandi wajyanye abahungu bawe n’abakobwa bawe, abo wambyariye, urabibatambirira ngo barimburwe.
ezekiyeli:16:21: 21.Mbese ubusambanyi bwawe urabwita icyoroshye ko wishe abana banjye, ukabatanga ngo babicishirizwe mu muriro?
ezekiyeli:16:22: 22.Kandi muri ibyo bizira byawe byose n’ubusambanyi bwawe, ntiwaruhije wibuka iminsi y’ubuto bwawe, igihe utawe wambaye ubusa ukigaragura mu ivata ryawe.
ezekiyeli:16:23: 23.“‘Nuko hanyuma y’ibyo bibi byawe byose (erega uzabona ishyano! Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga),
ezekiyeli:16:24: 24.wiyubakiye inzu aharengeye, kandi wishyirira ingoro mu nzira zose.
ezekiyeli:16:25: 25.Ingoro zawe wazubatse mu mahuriro y’inzira hose, ubwiza bwawe ubuhindura ikizira, kandi watambikirije uhita wese ugwiza ubusambanyi bwawe.
ezekiyeli:16:26: 26.Kandi wasambanye n’Abanyegiputa b’abaturanyi bawe, b’ibifufumange, ugwiriza ubusambanyi bwawe kundakaza.
ezekiyeli:16:27: 27.“‘Nuko rero dore nkuramburiyeho ukuboko kwanjye, kandi igerero ryawe ry’ibyokurya ndarigabanije. Ndagutanze ngo abakwanga bakugenze uko bashaka, ari bo bakobwa b’Abafilisitiya, bakojejwe isoni n’imigenzereze yawe mibi.
ezekiyeli:16:28: 28.“‘Kandi wasambanye na Ashuri, kuko ari ntabwo unyurwa. Ni ukuri wasambanye na bo, ariko ntiwanyurwa.
ezekiyeli:16:29: 29.Maze kandi wakwije ubusambanyi bwawe mu gihugu cy’i Kanāni ugeza i Bukaludaya, nyamara na bo ntibarakunyura.
ezekiyeli:16:30: 30.“‘Umwami Uwiteka aravuga ati: Umutima wawe ko utihanganye ugakora ibyo byose, umurimo w’umugore w’igishegabo cya maraya,
ezekiyeli:16:31: 31.kuko wiyubakiye inzu aharengeye mu mahuriro y’inzira hose, ukiremera ingoro mu nzira zose ndetse ntumere nk’abandi ba maraya, kuko utita ku bihembo.
ezekiyeli:16:32: 32.Ahubwo uri umugore w’umugabo kandi ugasambana, ukaryamana n’abashyitsi aho kuryamana n’umugabo wawe!
ezekiyeli:16:33: 33.Abamaraya bose barahembwa, ariko weho uhemba abasambane bawe bose, ukabagurira kugira ngo bakuzeho baturutse impande zose ngo basambane nawe.
ezekiyeli:16:34: 34.Ubusambanyi bwawe buciye ukubiri n’ubw’abandi bagore, kuko ari nta wagukurikiranaga ngo musambane, ahubwo utanga ibiguzi ariko weho ntugurirwe, ni cyo gituma ucishije ukubiri n’abandi.
ezekiyeli:16:35: 35.“ ‘Nuko rero wa musambanyi we, umva ijambo ry’Uwiteka.
ezekiyeli:16:36: 36.Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Kuko ibiteye ishozi byawe byasheshwe hasi, ibiteye isoni byawe bigatwikururwa bitewe n’ubusambanyi wagiranaga n’abakunzi bawe, no ku bw’ibigirwamana byose by’ibizira byawe, n’amaraso y’abana bawe wabihaye,
ezekiyeli:16:37: 37.dore ngiye guteraniriza abakunzi bawe bose hamwe, abakunezezaga n’abo wakundaga bose n’abo wangaga bose, nzabaguteranirizaho baguturuke impande zose, maze ntwikururire ibiteye isoni byawe kugira ngo babirebe byose.
ezekiyeli:16:38: 38.Kandi nzagucira urubanza ruhwanye n’urw’abagore basambana, kandi bakavusha amaraso, kandi nzakuvusha amaraso nkurakariye kandi ngufuhira.
ezekiyeli:16:39: 39.Maze nzagutanga mu maboko yabo, na bo bazarimbura ya nzu yawe y’aharengeye basenye n’ingoro zawe, kandi bazakwambura imyambaro yawe, bagucuze n’ibintu byawe byiza by’umurimbo, maze bagusige bagutamuruye kandi wambaye ubusa.
ezekiyeli:16:40: 40.“‘Bazaguteza n’igitero maze bagutere amabuye, kandi bagusogoteshe inkota zabo.
ezekiyeli:16:41: 41.Amazu yawe bazayatwika bakugezeho ibihano uri imbere y’abagore benshi, nanjye nzatuma utongera gusambana, kandi ntuzongera gutanga ibiguzi byabyo ukundi.
ezekiyeli:16:42: 42.Uku ni ko nzakuruhuriraho uburakari bwanjye, ifuh ryanjye rigushirireho, maze ntururukwe ne kongera kurakara.
ezekiyeli:16:43: 43.Kuko utibutse iminsi yo mu buto bwawe, ahubwo ukandakarisha ibyo byose. Nuko rero dore nanjye ngiye guherereza imigenzereze yawe ku mutwe wawe, kandi ibyo bibi n’ibizira byawe byose, ntabwo uzongera kubikora ukundi. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:16:44: 44.“‘Dore uca imigani wese azagucira uyu mugani ati: Nyina n’umukobwa ni ubutarutana.
ezekiyeli:16:45: 45.Uri uwa nyoko wanga umugabo we n’abana be, kandi uri umwe na bene nyoko banze abagabo babo n’abana babo. Nyoko yari Umuhetikazi, na we so yari Umwamori.
ezekiyeli:16:46: 46.“‘Kandi mukuru wawe ni Samariya uturanye ibumoso bwawe n’abakobwa be, na murumuna wawe utuye iburyo bwawe ni Sodomu n’abakobwa be.
ezekiyeli:16:47: 47.Nyamara ntiwagendeye mu nzira zabo cyangwa ngo ukurikize ibizira byabo gusa, ahubwo nk’aho wabigaye ngo byoroshye, wabarengeje kwiyanduza mu nzira zawe zose.
ezekiyeli:16:48: 48.“‘Umwami Uwiteka aravuga ngo: Ndirahiye yuko Sodomu murumuna wawe we n’abakobwa be, batagenje nkawe n’abakobwa bawe.
ezekiyeli:16:49: 49.Dore iki ni cyo gicumuro cya murumuna wawe Sodomu: ubwibone n’ibyokurya byinshi, n’ubukire bwe n’ubw’abakobwa be, kandi ntiyakomezaga ukuboko kw’abakene n’indushyi.
ezekiyeli:16:50: 50.Bari abirasi, maze bakorera ibizira imbere yanjye, nuko mbibonye mperako mbakuraho.
ezekiyeli:16:51: 51.“‘Ndetse na Samariya ntabwo yakoze ibyaha bingana n’igice cy’ibyawe, ariko weho wagwije ibizira byawe kubarusha, ibizira byawe byose wakoze bituma ukuza bene nyoko ho urubanza.
ezekiyeli:16:52: 52.Nawe ukorwe n’isoni ubwawe kuko wahaye urubanza bene nyoko, ku bw’ibyaha byawe wakoze birusha ibyabo kuba bibi bakurushije gukiranuka. Ni ukuri umware, kandi ukorwe n’isoni, kuko wakuje bene nyoko ho urubanza.
ezekiyeli:16:53: 53.“‘Nanjye nzagarura imbohe zabo, imbohe za Sodomu n’abakobwa be, n’imbohe za Samariya n’abakobwa be n’imbohe zawe ubwawe zizirimo,
ezekiyeli:16:54: 54.kugira ngo ukorwe n’isoni wowe ubwawe, umwazwe n’ibyo wakoze byose, kuko wabahumurije.
ezekiyeli:16:55: 55.Kandi bene nyoko Sodomu n’abakobwa be, bazongera kumera nk’uko bahoze, na Samariya n’abakobwa be na bo bazongera kumera nk’uko bahoze, kandi wowe n’abakobwa bawe muzongera kumera nk’uko mwahoze.
ezekiyeli:16:56: 56.Murumuna wawe Sodomu ntiwabaraga inkuru ze mu gihe cy’ubwibone bwawe,
ezekiyeli:16:57: 57.ibibi byawe bitaramenyekana nko mu gihe cy’ibikoza isoni by’abakobwa b’i Siriya, n’iby’abamukikijeho bose, abakobwa b’Abafilisitiya bagushinyagurira baguturutse impande zose?
ezekiyeli:16:58: 58.Ibibi byawe n’ibizira byawe wabyikoreye nk’umutwaro. Ni ko Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:16:59: 59.“‘Uwiteka aravuga ati: Nanjye nzakugenzereza nk’uko wagenje, kuko wahinyuye indahiro ukica isezerano.
ezekiyeli:16:60: 60.Ariko nzibuka isezerano nasezeranye nawe mu minsi y’ubuto bwawe, kandi nzagushyiriraho isezerano ry’iteka ryose.
ezekiyeli:16:61: 61.Ni bwo uzibuka inzira zawe ugakorwa n’isoni, ubwo uzakira bene nyoko, bakuru bawe na barumuna bawe, kandi nzabaguha bakubere abakobwa, ariko si ku bw’isezerano ryawe.
ezekiyeli:16:62: 62.Nuko nzakomeza isezerano ryanjye nawe, maze umenye yuko ari jye Uwiteka,
ezekiyeli:16:63: 63.kugira ngo ubone kwibuka no kumwarwa, kandi we kongera kubumbura akanwa kawe ubitewe n’isoni zawe, nimara kukubabarira ibyo wakoze byose. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.’ ”
ezekiyeli:17:1: Umugani w’ibisiga bibiri1.Maze ijambo ry’Uwiteka rinzaho riti
ezekiyeli:17:2: 2.“Mwana w’umuntu, sākuza kandi ucire inzu ya Isirayeli umugani uti
ezekiyeli:17:3: 3.‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Igisiga kinini gifite amababa manini kandi maremare, n’amoya menshi n’amabara atari amwe, cyaje i Lebanoni kijyana ishami ryo mu bushorishori ry’umwerezi,
ezekiyeli:17:4: 4.kiwukokoraho ihage ryo mu bushorishori bwawo kirijyana mu gihugu cy’ubucuruzi, maze kirishyira mu mudugudu w’abagenza.
ezekiyeli:17:5: 5.Kijyana no ku mbuto zo mu gihugu kiyitera mu butaka burumbuka, hafi y’amazi menshi kiba ari ho kiyishyira, kiyitera nk’umukinga.
ezekiyeli:17:6: 6.Maze iramera iba umuzabibu mugufi ugaba amashami, amashami yawo yerekera icyo gisiga, na yo imizi yawo ishora munsi yacyo. Nuko iba umuzabibu, umeraho amashami kandi ushibukaho amahage.
ezekiyeli:17:7: 7.“‘Hari n’ikindi gisiga kinini gifite amababa manini n’amoya menshi, nuko uwo muzabibu ukirandiraho imizi yawo kandi ucyerekeza amashami yawo, uri mu mayogi y’aho watewe kugira ngo kiwuvomerere.
ezekiyeli:17:8: 8.Watewe mu butaka bwiza hafi y’amazi menshi, kugira ngo umere amashami kandi were imbuto, ube n’umuzabibu mwiza.’
ezekiyeli:17:9: 9.“Uvuge uti ‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Mbese uzatoha? Ntikizarandura imizi yawo se, kikawushikuzaho imbuto kugira ngo wume, ibibabi bitoshye byose birabe? Ndetse kuwurandurana n’imizi yawo, ntibyagomba ukuboko gukomeye cyangwa abantu benshi.
ezekiyeli:17:10: 10.Mbese ko watewe, uzatoha? Ntuzuma rwose se, umuyaga w’iburasirazuba nuwugeraho? Uzumira mu mayogi aho wakuriye.’ ”
ezekiyeli:17:11: 11.Ijambo ry’Uwiteka ryongera kunzaho riti
ezekiyeli:17:12: 12.“Nuko ubwire iyo nzu y’abagome uti ‘Mbese ntimuzi uko uwo mugani usobanurwa?’ Ubabwire uti ‘Dore umwami w’i Babuloni yaje i Yerusalemu, ajyana umwami waho n’ibikomangoma byaho, abajyana iwe i Babuloni.
ezekiyeli:17:13: 13.Ajyana n’uw’urubyaro rw’umwami, asezerana na we kandi aramurahiza, ajyana intwari zo mu gihugu
ezekiyeli:17:14: 14.kugira ngo ubwami bugwe hasi bwe kwibyutsa, ahubwo buhagarikwe no gukomeza isezerano rye.
ezekiyeli:17:15: 15.Ariko aramugomera atuma intumwa ze muri Egiputa, kugira ngo bamuhe amafarashi n’abantu benshi. Mbese azahirwa? Ukora nk’ibyo azarokoka? Azica isezerano kandi arokoke?
ezekiyeli:17:16: 16.“ ‘Umwami Uwiteka aravuga ati: Ndirahiye, ni ukuri aho umwami wamwimitse atuye, uwo yasuzuguye indahiro ye akica n’isezerano rye, ni ho azapfira koko ari kumwe na we i Babuloni.
ezekiyeli:17:17: 17.Farawo na we, n’ingabo ze zikomeye n’ibitero bye byinshi, nta cyo azamumarira mu ntambara igihe bazarunda ibyo kuririraho, bakubaka ibihome kugira ngo barimbure abantu benshi.
ezekiyeli:17:18: 18.Yasuzuguye indahiro yica n’isezerano, ndetse yari yamanitse ukuboko kwe arahira ariko arengaho arabikora byose, ntabwo azarokoka.
ezekiyeli:17:19: 19.“ ‘Ni cyo gituma Umwami Uwiteka avuga ati: Ndirahiye, ni ukuri indahiro yanjye yasuzuguye n’isezerano ryanjye yishe, nzabigereka ku mutwe we.
ezekiyeli:17:20: 20.Kandi nzamuramburiraho urushundura rwanjye afatwe mu mutego wanjye, nanjye nzamujyana i Babuloni abe ari ho mwibukiriza igicumuro cye yancumuyeho.
ezekiyeli:17:21: 21.Kandi impunzi ze zose zo mu ngabo ze zose zizagushwa n’inkota, na bo abasigaye bazatatanirizwa mu birere byose, namwe muzamenya yuko jye Uwiteka ari jye wabivuze.
ezekiyeli:17:22: 22.“‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ati: Nanjye nzajyana icyo mu bushorishori bw’umwerezi maze ngitere, nzakokora ihage ryoroshye ryo mu mahage yo mu bushorishori bwawo maze nditere ahitegeye mu mpinga y’umusozi muremure,
ezekiyeli:17:23: 23.ku musozi muremure wa Isirayeli ni ho nzaritera, na ryo rizagaba amashami yera imbuto ribe umwerezi mwiza, kandi ibiguruka by’amoko yose bizībera munsi yawo, mu gicucu cy’amashami yawo ni ho bizaba.
ezekiyeli:17:24: 24.Maze ibiti byose byo mu ishyamba bizamenya yuko jye Uwiteka ari jye wacishije igiti kirekire bugufi, ngashyira hejuru igiti kigufi; numishije igiti gitoshye ntuma igiti cyumye gitoha. Jye Uwiteka narabivuze ndabisohoza.’ ”
ezekiyeli:18:1: Umugani w’inzabibu zirura; umuntu azazira ibyaha bye1.Ijambo ry’Uwiteka ryongera kunzaho riti
ezekiyeli:18:2: 2.“Kuki mujya mucira igihugu cya Isirayeli uyu mugani ngo ‘Ababyeyi bariye inzabibu zirura, ariko abana babo bakaba ari bo bagira ubushagarira mu kanwa’?
ezekiyeli:18:3: 3.“Ndirahiye, ni ko Uwiteka avuga, ntabwo muzongera gucira Isirayeli uwo mugani.
ezekiyeli:18:4: 4.Dore ubugingo bwa bose ni ubwanjye, ubugingo bw’umwana ni ubwanjye nk’ubugingo bwa se, ubugingo bukora icyaha ni bwo buzapfa.
ezekiyeli:18:5: 5.“Ariko umuntu niba ari umukiranutsi, agakora ibitunganye bihwanye n’amategeko,
ezekiyeli:18:6: 6.kandi akaba atagaburiye imandwa ku murinzi ushinzwe mu mpinga y’umusozi, n’ibigirwamana by’inzu ya Isirayeli ntabyuburire amaso kandi akaba atanduza umugore w’umuturanyi we, ategereye umugore uri mu mugongo,
ezekiyeli:18:7: 7.ari ntawe yagiriye nabi, ahubwo akaba yarashubije ingwate uwayimugwatirije kandi ari nta we yariganije, ahubwo akagaburira abashonji akambika abambaye ubusa,
ezekiyeli:18:8: 8.kandi ntagurize kubona indamu y’ubuhenzi cyangwa kwaka umuntu ibirenze urugero, ahubwo akarinda ukuboko kwe ikibi kandi umuntu uburana n’undi akabacira urubanza rutabera,
ezekiyeli:18:9: 9.akagendera mu mategeko yanjye, agakomeza amateka yanjye kandi akaba n’umunyamurava, uwo aba ari umukiranutsi, ni ukuri azabaho. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:18:10: 10.“Ariko nabyara umwana w’umuhungu akaba umwambuzi uvusha amaraso, akagira kimwe akora cyo muri ibyo,
ezekiyeli:18:11: 11.ntagire icyo akora cyo mu bikwiriye, ahubwo ndetse akaba yagaburiye imandwa ku murinzi ushinzwe mu mpinga y’umusozi, yaranduje n’umugore w’umuturanyi we,
ezekiyeli:18:12: 12.abakene n’indushyi yarabagiriye nabi kandi yarambuye abandi, ntasubize n’icyo yagwatirijwe, yaruburiye amaso ye ku bigirwamana kandi yarakoze ibizira,
ezekiyeli:18:13: 13.yaragurije kubona indamu y’ubuhenzi akaka umuntu ibirenze urugero, mbese azabaho? Ntabwo azabaho yarakoze ibyo bizira byose. Ni ukuri azapfa, n’amaraso ye ni we azabaho.
ezekiyeli:18:14: 14.“Nuko rero nabyara umwana w’umuhungu maze yabona ibyaha byose bya se, ibyo yakoze, agatinya ntakore nk’ibyo
ezekiyeli:18:15: 15.kandi akaba atagaburiye imandwa ku murinzi ushinzwe mu mpinga y’umusozi, n’ibigirwamana by’inzu ya Isirayeli atabyuburiye amaso ye, atanduje n’umugore w’umuturanyi we
ezekiyeli:18:16: 16.kandi ari ntawe yagiriye nabi, atakiriye n’ingwate, ari nta we yambuye ahubwo yaragaburiye abashonji kandi yarambitse n’abambaye ubusa,
ezekiyeli:18:17: 17.atabanguriye abakene ukuboko, atagurije kubona indamu y’ubuhenzi cyangwa ibirenze urugero, yarakomeje amategeko yanjye akagendera mu mateka yanjye, ntabwo azazira ibibi bya se, ni ukuri azabaho.
ezekiyeli:18:18: 18.Ariko se ubwe kuko yakoze iby’urugomo, akambura uwo bava inda imwe kandi agakorera ibitari byiza mu bwoko bwe, dore azapfa azize ibyo byaha bye.
ezekiyeli:18:19: 19.“Kandi murampakanya ngo ‘Umwana yabuzwa n’iki kuzira ibibi bya se?’ Ndabasubiza nti: Umwana nakora ibitunganye bihwanye n’amategeko, agakomeza amateka yanjye yose kandi akayakurikiza, ni ukuri azabaho.
ezekiyeli:18:20: 20.Ubugingo bukora icyaha ni bwo buzapfa, umwana ntazazira ibyaha bya se kandi na se ntazazira ibyaha by’umwana we, gukiranuka k’umukiranutsi kuzaba kuri we, kandi ibyaha by’umunyabyaha bizaba kuri we.
ezekiyeli:18:21: 21.“Ariko umunyabyaha nahindukira akava mu byaha bye byose yakoze, agakomeza amategeko yanjye yose kandi agakora ibitunganye bihwanye n’amategeko, ni ukuri azabaho ntabwo azapfa.
ezekiyeli:18:22: 22.Ibyaha bye byose yakoze nta na kimwe kizamubarwaho, azabeshwaho n’uko yabaye umukiranutsi.
ezekiyeli:18:23: 23.Muragira ngo nishimira ko umunyabyaha apfa? Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka abaza. Ikiruta si uko yahindukira akava mu nzira ye mbi, akabaho?
ezekiyeli:18:24: 24.“Ariko umukiranutsi nareka gukiranuka kwe agakora ibibi, agakurikiza ibizira byose, ibyo umunyabyaha akora, mbese azabaho? Ibyo gukiranuka yakoze byose nta na kimwe kizibukwa, ubugome bwe yagize n’icyaha cye yakoze ni byo azazira.
ezekiyeli:18:25: 25.“Ariko muravuga muti ‘Imigenzereze y’Uwiteka ntitunganye.’ Nimwumve mwa b’inzu ya Isirayeli mwe, mbese imigenzereze yanjye ntitunganye? Imigenzereze yanyu si yo idatunganye?
ezekiyeli:18:26: 26.Umukiranutsi nareka gukiranuka kwe agakora ibibi azabipfiramo, ibibi yakoze ni byo apfiramo.
ezekiyeli:18:27: 27.Maze kandi umunyabyaha nava mu byaha bye yakoraga, agakora ibitunganye bihwanye n’amategeko, azakiza ubugingo bwe.
ezekiyeli:18:28: 28.Kuko yihwituye akava mu bibi bye yakoze byose, ni ukuri azabaho ntabwo azapfa.
ezekiyeli:18:29: 29.Ariko ab’inzu ya Isirayeli baravuga bati ‘Imigenzereze y’Uwiteka ntitunganye.’ Mwa b’inzu ya Isirayeli mwe, mbese imigenzereze yanjye ntitunganye? Imigenzereze yanyu si yo idatunganye?
ezekiyeli:18:30: 30.“Ni cyo gituma ngiye kubacira urubanza, umuntu wese nk’uko imigenzereze ye iri, mwa b’inzu ya Isirayeli mwe. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga. Nimugaruke muve mu bibi byanyu byose, ibibi bitabatera kurimburwa.
ezekiyeli:18:31: 31.Nimute kure ibicumuro byanyu byose, ibyo mwakoze, mwirememo umutima mushya n’umwuka mushya. Kuki mwarinda gupfa, mwa b’inzu ya Isirayeli mwe?
ezekiyeli:18:32: 32.Erega sinishimira ugiye gupfa ko yapfa, nuko nimuhindukire mubeho.” Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:19:1: Aborogera Abisirayeli n’i Yerusalemu1.“Maze kandi uborogere ibikomangoma bya Isirayeli uvuge uti
ezekiyeli:19:2: 2.‘Nyoko yari iki? Yari intare y’ingore yiryamiraga mu ntare, ikonkereza ibibwana byayo mu migunzu y’intare.
ezekiyeli:19:3: 3.Nuko irera icyana cyayo kimwe kiba umugunzu w’intare, maze umenya guhiga ndetse ukarya n’abantu.
ezekiyeli:19:4: 4.Amahanga na yo yumva ibyawo maze ugwa mu bushya bwabo, bawujyanisha inkonzo mu gihugu cya Egiputa.
ezekiyeli:19:5: 5.Nuko iyo ntare ibonye ko iwutegereje ikawuheba, iherako yenda ikindi kibwana cyo mu bibwana byayo, ikigira umugunzu w’intare,
ezekiyeli:19:6: 6.ukajya uzerera mu ntare ari umugunzu, maze umenya guhiga ndetse ukarya n’abantu.
ezekiyeli:19:7: 7.Nuko umenya amanyumba yabo wubika imidugudu yabo, igihugu gihinduka amatongo n’inkenja yacyo irashira, bitewe no gutontoma kwawo.
ezekiyeli:19:8: 8.Maze amahanga awugererezaho aturutse mu bihugu, awuramburiraho urushundura rwayo maze ugwa mu bushya bwayo.
ezekiyeli:19:9: 9.Nuko bawubohera mu mbago, bawufashamo inkonzo bawushyira umwami w’i Babuloni, bawushyira mu bihome kugira ngo ijwi ryawo ritongera kumvikanira mu misozi ya Isirayeli.
ezekiyeli:19:10: 10.“‘Nyoko yari ameze nk’umuzabibu watewe hafi y’amazi, warumbutse ukagaba amashami ku bw’amazi menshi.
ezekiyeli:19:11: 11.Kandi wariho inkoni zikomeye z’imiringiso y’abami, uburebure bwazo bwasumbaga amashami atsikanye, kandi zikagaragazwa n’uburebure bwazo n’amashami yazo menshi.
ezekiyeli:19:12: 12.Ariko waranduranywe uburakari utsindwa hasi, maze umuyaga w’iburasirazuba wumisha amatunda yawo, inkoni zo kuri wo zikomeye zirahwanyuka maze ziruma, umuriro urazitwika.
ezekiyeli:19:13: 13.Noneho wateye mu butayu, mu gihugu cy’umukakaro gifite inyota.
ezekiyeli:19:14: 14.Kandi umuriro wavuye mu nkoni zo mu mashami yawo utwika amatunda yawo, bituma ari nta nkoni ikomeye y’umuringiso w’umwami imusigaraho.’ Ibyo ni umuborogo kandi bizaborogerwa.”
ezekiyeli:20:1: Ibibutsa ubugome bwa ba sekuruza; ibihanangiriza1.Nuko mu mwaka wa karindwi mu kwezi kwa gatanu, ku munsi wa cumi w’uko kwezi, bamwe bo mu bakuru ba Isirayeli baje guhanuza Uwiteka, bicara imbere yanjye.
ezekiyeli:20:2: 2.Maze ijambo ry’Uwiteka rinzaho riti
ezekiyeli:20:3: 3.“Mwana w’umuntu, vugana n’abakuru ba Isirayeli ubabwire uti ‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Mbese mwazanywe no kumpanuza? Ndirahiye ko ntazahanuzwa namwe.’ Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:20:4: 4.“Mbese uzabacira urubanza mwana w’umuntu, mbese uzabacira urubanza? Ubamenyeshe ibizira bya ba se
ezekiyeli:20:5: 5.ubabwire uti ‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Ku munsi natoyemo Isirayeli nkarahira urubyaro rw’inzu ya Yakobo, kandi nkabiyerekera mu gihugu cya Egiputa, igihe mbarahiye nti “Ndi Uwiteka Imana yanyu”,
ezekiyeli:20:6: 6.uwo munsi ni wo nabarahiriyeho ko nzabavana mu gihugu cya Egiputa, nkabajyana mu gihugu nari nabashakiye, igihugu cy’amata n’ubuki, kandi ari cyo gishimwa n’ibindi bihugu byose kuko ari cyo ngenzi.
ezekiyeli:20:7: 7.Nuko mperako ndababwira nti “Umuntu wese ate kure ibizira yahozagaho amaso, kandi mwe kwiyandurisha ibigirwamana byo muri Egiputa. Ni jye Uwiteka Imana yanyu.”
ezekiyeli:20:8: 8.Ariko barangomeye banga kunyumvira. Bose ntibata kure ibizira bahozagaho amaso, kandi ntibareka n’ibigirwamana byo muri Egiputa. Ni ko kuvuga ngo nzabasukaho uburakari bwanjye, nkabamariraho umujinya wanjye bari mu gihugu cya Egiputa.
ezekiyeli:20:9: 9.Ariko nagiriye izina ryanjye, kugira ngo ridasuzugurwa imbere y’abanyamahanga bari barimo, ari yo nabiyerekaniraga imbere, igihe nabakuraga mu gihugu cya Egiputa.
ezekiyeli:20:10: 10.“‘Nuko mbavana mu gihugu cya Egiputa mbajyana mu butayu.
ezekiyeli:20:11: 11.Maze mbaha amategeko yanjye mbamenyesha n’amateka yanjye, ari yo abeshaho uyakomeje.
ezekiyeli:20:12: 12.Maze kandi mbaha n’amasabato yanjye ngo abe ikimenyetso hagati yanjye na bo, kugira ngo bamenye yuko ari jye Uwiteka ubeza.
ezekiyeli:20:13: 13.Ariko ab’inzu ya Isirayeli barangomeye bari mu butayu, ntibagendera mu mategeko yanjye kandi banze n’amateka yanjye, ari yo abeshaho uyakomeje, n’amasabato yanjye barayaziruye cyane. Ni ko kuvuga yuko nzabasukaho uburakari bwanjye bari mu butayu kugira ngo mbarimbure.
ezekiyeli:20:14: 14.Ariko nagiriye izina ryanjye kugira ngo ridasuzugurirwa imbere y’abanyamahanga, abo nabakuye imbere.
ezekiyeli:20:15: 15.Kandi nabarahiriye mu butayu, yuko ntazabageza mu gihugu nabahaye cy’amata n’ubuki, ari cyo gishimwa n’ibindi bihugu byose, yuko ari cyo ngenzi,
ezekiyeli:20:16: 16.kuko banze amateka yanjye ntibagendere mu mategeko yanjye, n’amasabato yanjye bakayazirura, ahubwo imitima yabo yakurikiye ibigirwamana byabo.
ezekiyeli:20:17: 17.“ ‘Ariko ijisho ryanjye ryarabagiriye sinabarimbura, kandi sinabatsembaho rwose, igihe bari mu butayu.
ezekiyeli:20:18: 18.Nabwiriye abana babo mu butayu nti: Ntimukagendere mu mategeko ya ba so kandi ntimugakomeze amateka yabo, cyangwa ngo mwiyandurishe ibigirwamana byabo.
ezekiyeli:20:19: 19.Ndi Uwiteka Imana yanyu, mujye mugendera mu mategeko yanjye, mukomeze amateka yanjye kandi muyakurikize,
ezekiyeli:20:20: 20.kandi mujye mweza amasabato yanjye abe ikimenyetso hagati yanjye namwe, kugira ngo mumenye yuko ndi Uwiteka Imana yanyu.
ezekiyeli:20:21: 21.“‘Ariko abana babo na bo barangomeye ntibagendera mu mategeko yanjye, n’amateka yanjye ntibayakomeza ngo bayakurikize kandi ari yo abeshaho uyakomeje, n’amasabato yanjye barayaziruye. Maze mvuga yuko nzabasukaho uburakari bwanjye, nkabamariraho umujinya wanjye bari mu butayu.
ezekiyeli:20:22: 22.Ariko nageruye ukuboko kwanjye ngirira izina ryanjye, kugira ngo ridasuzugurirwa imbere y’abanyamahanga, abo nabakuye imbere.
ezekiyeli:20:23: 23.Nongeye kubarahirira mu butayu yuko nzabatataniriza mu mahanga, nkabateragana mu bihugu
ezekiyeli:20:24: 24.kuko batakomeje amateka yanjye, ahubwo amategeko yanjye barayanze bazirura n’amasabato yanjye, kandi amaso yabo akurikirana ibigirwamana bya ba se.
ezekiyeli:20:25: 25.“ ‘Nuko mbaha amategeko atababonereye n’amateka atababeshaho,
ezekiyeli:20:26: 26.kandi mbandurisha amaturo yabo, kuko bacishije impfura zabo zose mu muriro, kugira ngo mbahindure ingegera babone kumenya yuko ari jye Uwiteka.’
ezekiyeli:20:27: 27.“Nuko rero mwana w’umuntu, uvugane n’ab’inzu ya Isirayeli, ubabwire uti ‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Ba so barantutse ubwo bancumuyeho.
ezekiyeli:20:28: 28.Kuko maze kubageza mu gihugu, icyo narahiriye kubaha, babonye umusozi muremure wose n’igiti gitoshye cyose, baherako bahatambirira ibitambo byabo kandi baba ari ho baturira ituro ryabo rindakaza, bahosereza n’imibavu yabo kandi bahasukira n’amaturo yabo y’ibyokunywa.
ezekiyeli:20:29: 29.Maze ndababaza nti: Impamvu z’izo ngoro mujyamo ni iki? Ni cyo cyatumye izina ryazo ryitwa Bama kugeza n’ubu.’
ezekiyeli:20:30: 30.“Nuko rero ubwire ab’inzu ya Isirayeli uti ‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo mbese muriyanduza nk’uko ba so bagenje, mugasambana mukurikije ibizira byabo?
ezekiyeli:20:31: 31.Kuko iyo mutura amaturo yanyu mucisha n’abahungu banyu mu muriro, muba mwiyandurisha ibigirwamana byanyu byose kugeza na n’ubu. Mbese nahanuzwa namwe, mwa b’inzu ya Isirayeli mwe? Ndirahiye yuko ntazahanuzwa namwe. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:20:32: 32.Kandi mu byo mwibwira nta na kimwe kizaba, ubwo muvuga muti “Tuzamera nk’abanyamahanga, tube nk’imiryango yo mu bindi bihugu, dukorere ibishushanyo bibajwe mu biti no mu mabuye.”
ezekiyeli:20:33: 33.Umwami Uwiteka aravuga ngo: Ndirahiye ko ngiye kubabera umwami mbategekesheje amaboko akomeye kandi arambuye, n’uburakari busesuye.
ezekiyeli:20:34: 34.Kandi nzabakura mu mahanga, mbateranirize hamwe mbakuze mu bihugu mwatataniyemo n’amaboko akomeye kandi arambuye, n’uburakari busesuye.
ezekiyeli:20:35: 35.Nzabajyana mu butayu bw’abanyamahanga, ari ho nzababuranyiriza duhanganye amaso.
ezekiyeli:20:36: 36.Nk’uko naburanije ba sogokuruza banyu mu butayu bwo mu gihugu cya Egiputa, ni ko nzababuranya. Byavuzwe n’Umwami Uwiteka.
ezekiyeli:20:37: 37.“ ‘Kandi nzabacisha munsi y’inkoni yanjye, maze mbazane mu ndahiro y’isezerano,
ezekiyeli:20:38: 38.ariko nzabakuramo abagome n’abancumuyeho mbakure mu gihugu batuyemo, kandi ntibazinjira mu gihugu cya Isirayeli. Namwe muzamenya yuko ndi Uwiteka.
ezekiyeli:20:39: 39.“ ‘Yemwe ab’inzu ya Isirayeli mwe, uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Nimugende, umuntu wese akorere ibigirwamana bye, ariko hanyuma muzanyumvira, kandi izina ryanjye ryera ntabwo muzongera kuryandurisha amaturo yanyu n’ibigirwamana byanyu.
ezekiyeli:20:40: 40.Umwami Uwiteka aravuga ngo: Ku musozi wanjye wera, ku musozi w’impinga ya Isirayeli, ni ho ab’inzu ya Isirayeli bose n’abari mu gihugu bose bazankorera. Aho ni ho nzabakirira neza, kandi ni ho nzabakira amaturo, n’umuganura w’amaturo yanyu hamwe n’ibintu byanyu byera byose.
ezekiyeli:20:41: 41.Nzabakira nk’ibihumura neza ubwo nzabakura mu banyamahanga, nkabakoranya mbavanye mu bihugu mwatataniyemo, kandi nziyerekanira muri mwe imbere y’abanyamahanga ko ndi Uwera.
ezekiyeli:20:42: 42.Namwe muzamenya yuko ndi Uwiteka, igihe nzabajyana mu gihugu cya Isirayeli, mu gihugu narahiriye guha ba sogokuruza.
ezekiyeli:20:43: 43.Aho ni ho muzibukira inzira zanyu n’imirimo yanyu yose, iyo mwiyandurishije, kandi muzizinukwa ku bw’ibibi byose mwakoze.
ezekiyeli:20:44: 44.Kandi muzamenya yuko ndi Uwiteka nimara kubagenza ntyo ngirira izina ryanjye, kuko ntakurikije ingeso zanyu mbi, cyangwa imirimo yanyu yahumanye, mwa b’inzu ya Isirayeli mwe. Byavuzwe n’Umwami Uwiteka.’ ”
ezekiyeli:21:1: 1.Maze ijambo ry’Uwiteka rinzaho riti
ezekiyeli:21:2: 2.“Mwana w’umuntu, erekeza amaso yawe ikusi, wohereze ijambo ryawe ikusi, maze uhanurire ishyamba ryo mu kibaya cy’ikusi,
ezekiyeli:21:3: 3.ubwire ishyamba ryaho uti ‘Umva ijambo ry’Uwiteka. Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Dore ngiye kugukongeza, kandi umuriro wawe uzatwika igiti kibisi cyose n’igiti cyumye cyose bikurimo, ntabwo ibirimi by’umuriro bizazima, mu maso hose hazababirwa uhereye ikusi ukageza ikasikazi.
ezekiyeli:21:4: 4.Maze igifite ubugingo cyose kizabona ko ari jye Uwiteka uwukongeje, kandi ntuzazima.’ ”
ezekiyeli:21:5: 5.Nuko ndavuga nti “Ayii Mwami Uwiteka! Baramvuga bati ‘Mbese aho uriya muntu si umuci w’imigani?’ ”
ezekiyeli:21:6: Ikimenyetso cyo gusuhuza umutima6.Maze ijambo ry’Uwiteka rinzaho riti
ezekiyeli:21:7: 7.“Mwana w’umuntu, erekeza amaso yawe i Yerusalemu, wohereze ijambo ryawe ku buturo bwera, kandi uhanurire igihugu cya Isirayeli
ezekiyeli:21:8: 8.ukibwire uti ‘Uku ni ko Uwiteka avuga ngo: Dore ndakwibasiye, ngiye gukura inkota yanjye mu rwubati rwayo, maze ngutsembane n’abakiranutsi n’abanyabyaha.
ezekiyeli:21:9: 9.Nuko rero, ubwo nzagutsembana n’abakiranutsi n’abanyabyaha, ni cyo gituma inkota yanjye izava mu rwubati rwayo yibasiye ibifite umubiri byose uhereye ikusi ukageza ikasikazi,
ezekiyeli:21:10: 10.maze ibifite umubiri byose bizamenya yuko jye, Uwiteka, nakuye inkota yanjye mu rwubati rwayo, ntabwo izarusubiramo ukundi.’
ezekiyeli:21:11: 11.“Nuko rero unihe, mwana w’umuntu, kandi unihire imbere yabo ufite umubabaro mwinshi uguciye umugongo.
