ezekiyeli:38:13: 13.Sheba na Dedani n’abagenza b’i Tarushishi n’imigunzu y’intare yaho yose bazakubaza bati ‘Mbese uzanywe no gusahura? Igitero cyawe se wagiteranirije kuza kunyaga no gusahura ifeza n’izahabu, no gushorera amatungo n’ubutunzi, no kunyaga iminyago ikomeye?’
ezekiyeli:38:14: 14.“Nuko rero mwana w’umuntu, uhanure maze ubwire Gogi uti ‘Umva uko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Uwo munsi, igihe ubwoko bwanjye Isirayeli buzaba bwiraye, mbese ntuzabimenya?
ezekiyeli:38:15: 15.Icyo gihe uzaza uvuye mu gihugu cyawe ahahera h’ikasikazi, wowe n’amahanga menshi ari kumwe nawe bose bagendera ku mafarashi, igitero kinini n’ingabo nyinshi,
ezekiyeli:38:16: 16.maze uzazamuka utere ubwoko bwanjye Isirayeli umeze nk’igicu gitwikiriye igihugu. Ku minsi y’imperuka nzatuma utera igihugu cyanjye kugira ngo amahanga akurizeho kumenya, igihe nziyerekanira muri wowe imbere yabo ko ndi Uwera, yewe Gogi we.
ezekiyeli:38:17: 17.Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Mbese ni wowe uwo navugaga kera cyane, mvugiye mu bagaragu banjye b’abahanuzi ba Isirayeli, bahanuye mu myaka myinshi icyo gihe yuko ari wowe nzohereza kubatera?
ezekiyeli:38:18: 18.“‘Uwo munsi igihe Gogi azatera igihugu cya Isirayeli, uburakari bwanjye buzatunguka mu maso hanjye. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:38:19: 19.Kuko navuganye ifuhe ryanjye n’umuriro w’uburakari byanjye nti: Ni ukuri, uwo munsi hazaba igishyitsi gikomeye mu gihugu cya Isirayeli,
ezekiyeli:38:20: 20.gituma amafi yo mu nyanja n’ibisiga byo mu kirere, n’inyamaswa zo mu ishyamba n’ibyikurura bikururuka hasi byose, n’abantu bose bari ku isi bihindira umushyitsi imbere yanjye. Imisozi izubikwa, ahacuramye hatenguke kandi inkike zose ziridukire hasi.
ezekiyeli:38:21: 21.Nzahamagaza inkota yo kumutera imusange mu misozi yanjye yose, ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga, umuntu wese yuhire mwene se inkota.
ezekiyeli:38:22: 22.Nzamusohorezaho amateka yanjye, muteze indwara ya mugiga no kuva amaraso, kandi we n’ingabo ze n’amahanga menshi ari kumwe na we nzabamanurira imvura y’inkundura, mbateze amahindu manini y’urubura rukomeye n’umuriro n’amazuku.
ezekiyeli:38:23: 23.Uko ni ko nzagaragaza icyubahiro cyanjye no kwera kwanjye, kandi nzimenyekanisha imbere y’amahanga menshi, maze bamenye yuko ndi Uwiteka.’
ezekiyeli:39:1: 1.“Nuko rero mwana w’umuntu, uhanurire Gogi uti ‘Umva uko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Dore ndakwibasiye yewe Gogi we, mwami w’i Roshi n’i Mesheki n’i Tubali.
ezekiyeli:39:2: 2.Nzagusubiza inyuma, ngushorere nkuzamure uturutse ahahera h’ikasikazi, nkugeze ku misozi ya Isirayeli.
ezekiyeli:39:3: 3.Umuheto wawe uri mu kuboko kwawe kw’ibumoso nzawugutesha, n’imyambi yawe iri mu kuboko kwawe kw’iburyo nyigushe hasi.
ezekiyeli:39:4: 4.Uzagwa ku misozi ya Isirayeli wowe n’ingabo zawe n’amahanga ari kumwe nawe, nzakugabiza ibisiga by’amoko yose bikugāshe, n’inyamaswa zo mu gasozi ngo zigutanyaguze.
ezekiyeli:39:5: 5.Uzagwa ku gahinga kuko ari jye wabitegetse. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:39:6: 6.Maze nzohereza umuriro kuri Magogi no ku bantu baturaga mu birwa bīrāye, kandi bazamenya yuko ndi Uwiteka.
ezekiyeli:39:7: 7.Izina ryanjye ryera nzarimenyekanisha mu bwoko bwanjye Isirayeli, kandi ntabwo nzareka izina ryanjye ngo bongere kurikerensa ukundi, maze amahanga azamenye yuko ndi Uwiteka, Uwera wa Isirayeli.
ezekiyeli:39:8: 8.“‘Dore biraje kandi bizasohora, uyu ni wa munsi navugaga. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:39:9: 9.Maze abatuye mu midugudu ya Isirayeli bazasohoka bacane intwaro bazitwike, ingabo nto n’inini n’imyambi n’inshyimbo n’amacumu, bazamara imyaka irindwi bakizitwika.
ezekiyeli:39:10: 10.Ntabwo bazajya gusenya inkwi mu gasozi, cyangwa kugira izo batema mu ishyamba kuko bazacana intwaro, bagasahura ababasahuye, bakanyaga ababanyaze. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:39:11: 11.“‘Uwo munsi nzaha Gogi aho guhambwa ho muri Isirayeli, ikibaya cy’abagenzi kiri aherekera iburasirazuba h’inyanja, bitume abagenzi batakihanyura. Aho ni ho bazahamba Gogi n’inteko ze zose, maze bahite ikibaya cya Hamoni Gogi.
ezekiyeli:39:12: 12.Ab’inzu ya Isirayeli bazamara amezi arindwi babahamba, kugira ngo batunganye igihugu.
ezekiyeli:39:13: 13.Ni ukuri abantu bose bo mu gihugu bazabahamba, bizababera icyubahiro umunsi nzakuzwa. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:39:14: 14.Kandi bazatora abantu bo kujya babikora iteka, bagende igihugu bararuza intumbi z’abagenzi zasigaye ku gasozi kugira ngo bahatunganye, amezi arindwi nashira bajye gushakura izipfuritse.
ezekiyeli:39:15: 15.Kandi abanyura mu gihugu bazahanyura, nihagira ubona igufwa ry’umuntu azarishyireho ikimenyetso, kugeza ubwo abahambyi bazarihamba mu kibaya cya Hamoni Gogi.
ezekiyeli:39:16: 16.Kandi izina ry’umudugudu umwe uzitwa Hamoni. Uko ni ko bazatunganya igihugu.’
ezekiyeli:39:17: 17.“Nuko rero mwana w’umuntu, uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Ubwire ibisiga by’amoko yose n’inyamaswa zose zo mu ishyamba uti ‘Nimuteranire hamwe muze, mwikoranirize hamwe muturutse impande zose muze ku gitambo cyanjye mbatambiriye, igitambo gikomeye cyo ku misozi ya Isirayeli, kugira ngo murye inyama kandi munywe n’amaraso.
ezekiyeli:39:18: 18.Muzarya inyama z’intwari kandi munywe amaraso y’abami bo mu isi, n’ay’amasekurume y’intama n’ay’abana bazo, n’ay’ihene n’ay’amapfizi byose ari ibibyibushye by’i Bashani.
ezekiyeli:39:19: 19.Kandi muzarya ibinure muhage munywe n’amaraso musinde, iby’igitambo nabatambiriye.
ezekiyeli:39:20: 20.Muzahāgira ku meza yanjye, muhagijwe n’amafarashi n’amagare y’intambara n’intwari n’ingabo zose.’ Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:39:21: 21.“Ubwiza bwanjye nzabushyira hagati y’amahanga, kandi amahanga yose azabona amateka yanjye nasohoje, n’ukuboko kwanjye nabaramburiyeho.
ezekiyeli:39:22: 22.Uko ni ko ab’inzu ya Isirayeli bazamenya yuko ndi Uwiteka Imana yabo, uhereye uwo munsi no mu bihe bizakurikiraho.
ezekiyeli:39:23: 23.Kandi amahanga azamenya yuko ab’inzu ya Isirayeli bajyanywe ho imbohe bahowe ibicumuro byabo, kuko bancumuyeho bigatuma mbakuraho amaso nkabatanga mu maboko y’ababisha babo, bose bakicishwa inkota.
ezekiyeli:39:24: 24.Nabagiriye nabi nkurikije umwanda wabo n’ibicumuro byabo, mbima amaso yanjye.
ezekiyeli:39:25: 25.“Ni cyo gituma Umwami Uwiteka avuga ati: Noneho ngiye kugarura Abayakobo bajyanwe ari imbohe, mbabarire ab’inzu ya Isirayeli bose, kandi ndinde icyubahiro cy’izina ryanjye.
ezekiyeli:39:26: 26.Nibamara gukozwa isoni bahaniwe ibicumuro byabo byose bancumuyeho, bazatura mu gihugu cyabo bīrāre ari nta wubatera ubwoba.
ezekiyeli:39:27: 27.Nimara kubagarura mbavanye mu moko, mbateranirije hamwe mbakuye mu bihugu by’ababisha babo, ni bwo nziyerekanira muri bo imbere y’amahanga menshi ko ndi Uwera.
ezekiyeli:39:28: 28.Bazamenya yuko ndi Uwiteka Imana yabo ubwo natumye bajyanwa mu mahanga ari imbohe, nkabagarura mu gihugu cyabo bwite ari nta wo muri bo nzaba mpasize.
ezekiyeli:39:29: 29.Ntabwo nzongera kubima amaso ukundi, kuko nasutse Umwuka wanjye ku nzu ya Isirayeli.” Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:40:1: Iby’urusengero rushya1.Mu mwaka twari tumaze imyaka makumyabiri n’itanu tukiri abanyagano, mu itangira ry’umwaka ku munsi wa cumi w’ukwezi, hashize imyaka cumi n’ine umurwa ufashwe, muri uwo munsi ukuboko k’Uwiteka kwangezeho maze anjyanayo.
ezekiyeli:40:2: 2.Yangejeje mu gihugu cya Isirayeli ndi mu buryo Imana yerekesha abantu, angeza mu mpinga y’umusozi muremure cyane aherekeye ikusi ho kuri wo, hari igisa n’umurwa wubatsweho.
ezekiyeli:40:3: 3.Nuko anjyanayo, ndebye mbona umuntu uhagaze ku irembo ishusho ye isa n’umuringa, afite umugozi w’imigwegwe n’urubingo rwo kugeresha mu ntoki.
ezekiyeli:40:4: 4.Maze uwo muntu arambwira ati “Mwana w’umuntu, rebesha amaso yawe, wumvishe amatwi yawe kandi ushyire umutima wawe ku byo ngiye kukwereka byose, kuko wazanywe aha no kugira ngo mbikwereke. Ibyo ubona byose ubibwire ab’inzu ya Isirayeli.”
ezekiyeli:40:5: 5.Nuko mbona inkike ikikije urusengero, n’uwo muntu ufite mu ntoki urubingo rw’urugero rwa mikono itandatu, umukono wose urenzeho intambwe y’intoki, maze agera ubugari bw’iyo nkike buba urubingo incuro imwe, n’uburebure bw’impagarike na bwo ari urubingo.
ezekiyeli:40:6: 6.Nuko aza ku irembo ry’aherekeye iburasirazuba azamukira ku rwuririro rwaho, agera igikingi kimwe cy’irembo ubugari bwacyo buba urubingo incuro imwe, n’ikindi gikingi ubugari bwacyo na cyo ari incuro imwe.
ezekiyeli:40:7: 7.Akumba kose uburebure bwako buba urubingo incuro imwe, n’ubugari bwako ari indi ncuro, hagati y’utwo twumba haciye umwanya wa mikono itanu, ahanyurwa hafi y’ibaraza ry’irembo aherekera ku nzu na ho hari urubingo incuro imwe.
ezekiyeli:40:8: 8.Agera n’ibaraza ry’irembo aherekera ku nzu, riba urubingo incuro imwe.
ezekiyeli:40:9: 9.Maze agera ibaraza rindi ry’irembo riba mikono munani, ibikingi byaryo biba mikono ibiri kandi iryo baraza ry’irembo ryari aherekeye ku nzu.
ezekiyeli:40:10: 10.Utwumba two ku irembo ry’aherekeye iburasirazuba twari dutatu mu ruhande rumwe, n’utundi dutatu mu rundi ruhande. Twose twari urugero rumwe, n’ibikingi byaryo by’impande zombi byari urugero rumwe.
ezekiyeli:40:11: 11.Agera ubugari bwo mu bikingi by’irembo buba mikono cumi, kandi uburebure bw’irembo buba mikono cumi n’itatu.
ezekiyeli:40:12: 12.Umwanya wari uciye imbere y’utwumba wari mukono umwe mu ruhande rumwe, n’undi mwanya wa mukono umwe mu rundi ruhande, n’utwumba twari mikono itandatu mu ruhande rumwe, na mikono itandatu mu rundi ruhande.
ezekiyeli:40:13: 13.Maze agera irembo ahereye ku gisenge cy’akumba kamwe ageza ku gisenge cy’akandi, ubugari bwaryo buba mikono makumyabiri n’itanu, amarembo yerekeranye.
ezekiyeli:40:14: 14.Ashyiraho n’inkingi agera mikono mirongo itandatu, urugo rugarukira ku nkingi kandi ruzengurutse irembo.
ezekiyeli:40:15: 15.Uhereye inyuma y’ibikingi by’irembo ahanyurwa, ukageza ku ibaraza ry’irembo ry’imbere, hari mikono mirongo itanu.
ezekiyeli:40:16: 16.Utwo twumba twari dufite amadirishya akinzwe, two n’inkingi zatwo ziri ku irembo ry’imbere impande zose n’ibaraza. Amadirishya yari ku mpande zose z’imbere, inkingi yose iriho imikindo.
ezekiyeli:40:17: 17.Maze anjyana mu rugo rw’inyuma mpabona utwumba n’imbuga ishashweho amabuye, bikikijeho urugo impande zose, kuri iyo mbuga ishashweho amabuye hari utwumba mirongo itatu.
ezekiyeli:40:18: 18.Mu mpande z’amarembo ni ho iyo mbuga ishashweho amabuye yari iri ihuye n’uburebure bw’amarembo, yari imbuga ishashweho amabuye yo hepfo.
ezekiyeli:40:19: 19.Maze agera ubugari uhereye imbere y’irembo ryo hepfo, ageza imbere ku rundi rugo ruri imbere haba mikono ijana, uko ari habiri iburasirazuba n’ikasikazi.
ezekiyeli:40:20: 20.Agera uburebure bw’irembo ry’urugo rw’inyuma ry’aherekeye ikasikazi, n’ubugari bwaryo.
ezekiyeli:40:21: 21.Utwumba two kuri ryo twari dutatu mu ruhande rumwe n’utundi dutatu mu rundi ruhande. Ibikingi byaryo n’amabaraza yaryo byari bihwanyije urugero n’irembo rya mbere, uburebure bwaryo buba mikono mirongo itanu, n’ubugari bwaryo buba mikono makumyabiri n’itanu.
ezekiyeli:40:22: 22.Amadirishya yo kuri ryo, n’amabaraza yo kuri ryo n’imikindo yaho, byari bihwanyije urugero n’irembo ry’aherekeye iburasirazuba, kandi bahageraga bazamukiye ku rwuririro rw’intambwe ndwi, n’amabaraza yo kuri ryo yari yerekeranye.
ezekiyeli:40:23: 23.Irembo ry’aherekeye ikasikazi n’iry’aherekeye iburasirazuba yari yerekeranye n’amarembo y’urugo rw’imbere, maze agera ahereye ku irembo rimwe kugeza ku rindi haba mikono ijana.
ezekiyeli:40:24: 24.Maze anjyana aherekeye ikusi, mpabona irembo ryerekeye ikusi. Nuko agera ibikingi byaryo n’amabaraza yaryo, nk’uko ingero za mbere zari ziri.
ezekiyeli:40:25: 25.Ryari rifite amadirishya ryo n’amabaraza yo kuri ryo ahakikije, nka ya madirishya ya mbere. Uburebure bwaryo buba mikono mirongo itanu, n’ubugari bwaryo buba mikono makumyabiri n’itanu.
ezekiyeli:40:26: 26.Kuhagera hari urwuririro ruriho intambwe ndwi, kandi amabaraza yo kuri ryo yari yerekeranye na rwo. Ryari ririho imikindo umwe uri mu ruhande rumwe, undi uri mu rundi ku bikingi byaryo.
ezekiyeli:40:27: 27.Hari n’irembo ku rugo rw’imbere ry’aherekeye ikusi, maze agera ahereye ku irembo kugeza ku rindi ry’aherekeye ikusi, haba mikono ijana.
ezekiyeli:40:28: 28.Maze anjyana mu rugo rw’imbere anyujije mu irembo ry’aherekeye ikusi, nuko agera irembo ry’aherekeye ikusi nk’uko ingero za mbere zari ziri,
ezekiyeli:40:29: 29.n’utwumba n’ibikingi byaryo n’amabaraza yaryo nk’uko izo ngero zari ziri, kandi ryari rifite amadirishya ryo n’amabaraza yo kuri ryo ahakikije. Uburebure bwaryo bwari mikono mirongo itanu, n’ubugari bwaryo bwari makumyabiri n’itanu.
ezekiyeli:40:30: 30.Kandi amabaraza yari ahakikije uburebure bwayo bwari mikono makumyabiri n’itanu, ubugari bwayo ari mikono itanu.
ezekiyeli:40:31: 31.Amabaraza yari aherekeye ku rugo rw’inyuma n’ibikingi byaryo biriho imikindo, kuhagera hari urwuririro ruriho intambwe munani.
ezekiyeli:40:32: 32.Maze anjyana mu rugo rw’imbere aherekeye iburasirazuba, nuko agera irembo nk’uko izo ngero zari ziri,
ezekiyeli:40:33: 33.n’utwumba twaryo n’ibikingi byaryo n’amabaraza yaryo nk’uko izo ngero zari ziri, kandi ryari rifite amadirishya ryo n’amabaraza yaryo ahakikije. Uburebure bwaryo bwari mikono mirongo itanu, n’ubugari bwaryo mikono makumyabiri n’itanu.
ezekiyeli:40:34: 34.Amabaraza yaryo yari yerekeye ku rugo rw’inyuma n’ibikingi byaryo byariho imikindo iri mu ruhande rumwe no mu rundi ruhande, kuhagera hari urwuririro ruriho intambwe munani.
ezekiyeli:40:35: 35.Maze anjyana ku irembo ry’aherekeye ikasikazi, arigera nk’uko izo ngero zari ziri,
ezekiyeli:40:36: 36.n’utwumba twaryo n’ibikingi byaryo n’amabaraza yaryo, kandi ryari rifite amadirishya ahakikije. Uburebure bwaryo buba mikono mirongo itanu, ubugari bwaryo buba mikono makumyabiri n’itanu.
ezekiyeli:40:37: 37.Kandi ibikingi byaryo byari aherekeye ku rugo rw’inyuma, ibikingi byaryo biriho imikindo iri mu ruhande rumwe no mu rundi ruhande, kuhagera hari urwuririro ruriho intambwe munani.
ezekiyeli:40:38: 38.Iruhande rw’ibikingi by’amarembo hari akumba gafite umuryango, aho ni ho buhagiriraga ibitambo byoswa.
ezekiyeli:40:39: 39.Ku ibaraza ry’irembo mu ruhande rumwe hari ameza abiri, no mu rundi ruhande kandi yandi abiri yo kubagiraho igitambo cyoswa, n’igitambo cy’ibyaha n’igitambo cyo gukuraho urubanza.
ezekiyeli:40:40: 40.Mu ruhande ruhera hanze, ahazamuka ho kunyurwa mu irembo ry’aherekeye ikasikazi hari ameza abiri. no mu rundi ruhande aherekeye ku ibaraza ry’irembo hari ayandi abiri.
ezekiyeli:40:41: 41.Mu ruhande rumwe hari ameza ane, no mu rundi ruhande yandi ane iruhande rw’irembo, ayo meza uko ari umunani bayabagiragaho ibitambo.
ezekiyeli:40:42: 42.Kandi hari n’ameza ane yaremwe mu mabuye yasatuwe ku bw’ibitambo byoswa, uburebure bwayo ari mukono umwe n’igice, n’ubugari bwayo ari mukono umwe n’igice, n’uburebure bwayo bw’impagarike ari mukono umwe. Ni yo baterekagaho ibikoreshwa byo kubagisha ibitambo byoswa, n’ibindi bitambo
ezekiyeli:40:43: 43.Hari n’inkonzo, uburebure bwazo ari intambwe y’intoki zishimangiye ahakikije hose, ku meza hari inyama z’ibitambo.
ezekiyeli:40:44: 44.Inyuma y’irembo ry’imbere hari utwumba tw’abaririmbyi mu rugo rw’imbere, twari iruhande ry’irembo ry’aherekeye ikasikazi twerekeye ikusi, kamwe kari iruhande rw’irembo ry’aherekeye iburasirazuba kerekeye ikasikazi.
ezekiyeli:40:45: 45.Maze arambwira ati “Aka kumba kerekeye ikusi ni ak’abatambyi barinda urusengero,
ezekiyeli:40:46: 46.n’akumba kerekeye ikasikazi ni ak’abatambyi barinda igicaniro, ari bo bene Sadoki bo mu rubyaro rwa Lewi begera Uwiteka ngo bamukorere.”
ezekiyeli:40:47: 47.Maze agera urugo uburebure bwarwo buba mikono ijana, n’ubugari bwarwo buba yindi ijana rungana impande zose uko ari enye, igicaniro kiri imbere y’urusengero.
ezekiyeli:40:48: 48.Maze anjyana ku ibaraza ry’urusengero, agera inkingi zose zo ku ibaraza, mu ruhande rumwe haba mikono itanu no mu rundi ruhande yindi itanu, n’ubugari bw’irembo buba mikono itatu mu ruhande rumwe, na yindi itatu mu rundi ruhande.
ezekiyeli:40:49: 49.Uburebure bw’umurambararo bw’ibaraza bwari mikono makumyabiri, n’ubugari bwaryo ari mikono cumi n’umwe, kuhagera hari urwuririro kandi ku bikingi by’irembo hari inkingi, imwe iri mu ruhande rumwe, indi iri mu rundi ruhande.
ezekiyeli:41:1: 1.Maze anjyana mu rusengero agera inkomanizo, ubugari bwazo buba mikono itandatu mu ruhande rumwe, na yindi itandatu mu rundi ruhande, bwahoze ari ubugari bw’ihema.
ezekiyeli:41:2: 2.Ubugari bw’umuryango buba mikono cumi, kandi impande z’umuryango ziba mikono itanu mu ruhande rumwe, n’iyindi itanu mu rundi ruhande, maze agera uburebure bwarwo bw’umurambararo buba mikono mirongo ine, n’ubugari bwarwo mikono makumyabiri.
ezekiyeli:41:3: 3.Maze arwinjiramo agera inkomanizo z’umuryango zombi ziba mikono ibiri, uburebure bw’igihagararo bw’umuryango buba mikono itandatu, n’ubugari bw’umuryango buba mikono irindwi.
ezekiyeli:41:4: 4.Imbere harwo ahagera uburebure bwa mikono makumyabiri, n’ubugari na bwo ari uko maze arambwira ati “Aha ni ahera cyane.”
ezekiyeli:41:5: 5.Maze agera urusika rw’urusengero ruba mikono itandatu, n’ubugari bw’akumba k’iruhande kose buba mikono ine, dukikije ku nzu impande zose.
ezekiyeli:41:6: 6.Kandi utwo twumba tw’iruhande twari tugerekeranye dutatu dutatu, umurongo wose urimo utwumba mirongo itatu, twari twometse ku rusika rwari rukikije ku rusengero impande zose, kugira ngo tutegamira urusika rw’urusengero.
ezekiyeli:41:7: 7.Utwo twumba twari dukikije ku rusengero uko twari tugerekeranye ni ko twarutanaga, kandi inzira ikikije ku rusengero yakomezaga kuzamuka iyigose. Ahahera hejuru h’urusengero harushaho kuba hagari, kandi uwajyaga mu kumba ko hejuru avuye mu ko hasi yanyuraga ku ko hagati.
ezekiyeli:41:8: 8.Maze mbona yuko urwo rusengero rufite urufatiro rusumbaho. Imfatiro z’utwo twumba turukikijeho, uburebure bwazo bwari urubingo incuro imwe rwa mikono minini itandatu.
ezekiyeli:41:9: 9.Umubyimba w’urusika rwo kuri utwo twumba tw’iruhande aherekeye hanze wari mikono itanu, kandi ahasigaye hari ah’utwo twumba tw’iruhande rw’urusengero.
ezekiyeli:41:10: 10.Kuva ku twumba kugeza kuri iyo nzu, hari umwanya wa mikono makumyabiri impande zose.
ezekiyeli:41:11: 11.Imiryango y’utwo twumba yari yerekeye ahasigaye, umuryango umwe wari werekeye ikasikazi undi muryango werekeye ikusi, kandi umwanya utubatswemo wose ubugari bwawo bwari mikono itanu.
ezekiyeli:41:12: 12.Kandi inzu yari imbere y’umwanya uciye hagati aherekeye iburengerazuba, ubugari bwawo bwari mikono mirongo irindwi, umubyimba w’urusika rw’iyo nzu ari mikono itanu hose, n’uburebure bwayo bw’umurambararo ari mikono mirongo urwenda.
ezekiyeli:41:13: 13.Nuko agera urusengero uburebure bw’umurambararo buba mikono ijana, umwanya uciye hagati wo n’iyo nzu n’insika zayo uburebure bwabyo buba mikono ijana,
ezekiyeli:41:14: 14.ubugari bw’imbere y’urusengero, ho n’umwanya uciye hagati w’aherekeye iburasirazuba buba mikono ijana.
ezekiyeli:41:15: 15.Maze agera uburebure bw’umurambararo bw’inzu iri imbere y’umwanya uciye hagati, na wo uri inyuma yayo n’amabaraza yayo yombi, buba mikono ijana.
ezekiyeli:41:16: 16.Imbere h’urusengero n’amabaraza y’urugo, n’inkomanizo n’amadirishya akinzwe, n’amabaraza akikije ku mazu agerekeranye atatu atatu, no mu irebe ry’umuryango hose, igisenge cyari imbaho, kandi uhereye hasi ukageza ku madirishya, ndetse amadirishya yari atwikiriwe,
ezekiyeli:41:17: 17.hejuru y’umuryango no mu nzu imbere n’inyuma, n’urusika rwose imbere n’inyuma, byose byari bihwanyije urugero.
ezekiyeli:41:18: 18.Byari bishushanijweho abakerubi n’imikindo, hagati y’umukerubi n’undi hagiye haba umukindo, kandi umukerubi wese yari afite mu maso habiri,
ezekiyeli:41:19: 19.mu maso h’umuntu herekeye ku mukindo uri mu ruhande rumwe, no mu maso h’umugunzu w’intare herekeye ku mukindo uri mu rundi ruhande. Uko ni ko byari bishushanijwe ku rusengero impande zose.
ezekiyeli:41:20: 20.Uhereye hasi ukageza hejuru y’umuryango hari hashushanijwe abakerubi n’imikindo, uko ni ko urusika rw’urusengero rwari rushushanijweho.
ezekiyeli:41:21: 21.Inkingi z’umuryango w’urusengero zanganaga impande zose, kandi uruhande rw’imbere rw’ubuturo bwera rwasaga n’urusengero.
ezekiyeli:41:22: 22.Igicaniro cyabajwe mu biti, uburebure bw’igihagararo bwacyo bwari mikono itatu, n’uburebure bw’umurambararo ari mikono ibiri. Inkokora zacyo n’amaguru yacyo n’imbavu zacyo byari byarabajwe mu biti, maze arambwira ati “Aya ni yo meza ari imbere y’Uwiteka.”
ezekiyeli:41:23: 23.Kandi urusengero n’ubuturo bwera byari bifite inzugi ebyiri,
ezekiyeli:41:24: 24.urugi rwose rwari rufite imigabane ibiri ikingurwa, urugi rumwe rurimo imigabane ibiri n’urundi rugi yindi ibiri.
ezekiyeli:41:25: 25.Inzugi z’urusengero zari zishushanijweho abakerubi n’imikindo, nk’uko byari bishushanijwe ku nsika, mu irebe ry’umuryango hari hatinzwe ibiti bikomeye.
ezekiyeli:41:26: 26.Kandi hari amadirishya akinzwe n’imikindo mu ruhande rumwe, no mu rundi ruhande na ho ari uko, biri mu mpande zombi z’umuryango. Uko ni ko utwumba dukikije ku rusengero two n’inkomanizo, byari bimeze.
ezekiyeli:42:1: 1.Maze amvanayo anjyana mu rugo rw’inyuma aherekeye ikasikazi, angeza mu kumba kari imbere y’umwanya uciye hagati, kerekeye ku nzu iri aherekeye ikasikazi.
ezekiyeli:42:2: 2.Uruhande rwarimo urugi rw’aherekeye ikasikazi, uburebure bw’umurambararo bwarwo bwari mikono ijana, ubugari bwarwo ari mikono mirongo itanu.
ezekiyeli:42:3: 3.Rwari rwerekeye ahari mikono makumyabiri y’urugo rw’imbere, kandi rwerekeye no ku mbuga ishashweho amabuye y’urugo rw’inyuma, aho amabaraza y’utwumba twari tugerekeranye dutatu dutatu yari ari.
ezekiyeli:42:4: 4.Imbere y’utwo twumba hari inzira ifite ubugari bwa mikono cumi n’akayira ka mukono umwe, kandi imiryango yatwo yari yerekeye ikasikazi.
ezekiyeli:42:5: 5.Utwumba two hejuru twari duto ku two hasi n’utwo hagati, kuko twatubijwe n’amabaraza yatwo.
ezekiyeli:42:6: 6.Kuko twari tugerekeranije dutatu dutatu, ariko tudafite inkingi nk’inkingi za za ngo, ni cyo cyatumaga uhereye hasi utwumba two hejuru tuba duto ku two hasi no ku two hagati.
ezekiyeli:42:7: 7.Urusika rw’utwumba rwaheraga inyuma ku rugo rw’inyuma ruri imbere y’utwumba, uburebure bwarwo bwari mikono mirongo itanu,
ezekiyeli:42:8: 8.kuko uburebure bw’umurambararo bw’utwumba tw’aherekeye mu rugo rw’inyuma bwari mikono mirongo itanu, ariko imbere y’urusengero ho hari mikono ijana.
ezekiyeli:42:9: 9.Munsi y’utwo twumba hari irembo ryerekeye iburasirazuba, ryanyurwagamo n’abaturuka mu rugo rw’inyuma.
ezekiyeli:42:10: 10.Mu mubyimba w’urusika rw’urugo rw’aherekeye iburasirazuba, na ho hari utwumba twari imbere y’umwanya uciye hagati, twerekeye ku nzu.
ezekiyeli:42:11: 11.Inzira yari imbere yatwo yasaga n’inzira yari ku twumba tw’aherekeye ikasikazi, twose twanganaga mu burebure no mu bugari. Imiryango yatwo n’uko twaringanijwe n’inzugi zatwo, byose byarasaga.
ezekiyeli:42:12: 12.Inzugi z’utwumba tw’aherekeye ikusi na zo ni ko zari zimeze, ku mutwe w’inzira hari urugi, ari yo nzira yari iri imbere y’urusika rw’aherekeye iburasirazuba, ahanyurwa.
ezekiyeli:42:13: 13.Maze arambwira ati “Utwumba tw’aherekeye ikasikazi n’utw’aherekeye ikusi, turi imbere y’umwanya uciye hagati ni two twumba twera, aho abatambyi begera Uwiteka bazarira ibintu byera. Ni ho bazatereka ibintu byera cyane n’ituro ry’ifu, n’igitambo cy’ibyaha n’igitambo cyo gukuraho urubanza, kuko ari ahantu hera.
ezekiyeli:42:14: 14.Abatambyi nbinjira, ntibazasohoka ngo bave ahera bajye mu rugo rw’inyuma bambaye imyambaro yabo bambara bakorera Imana, ahubwo bazaba ari ho bayibika kuko ari iyera, maze bambare indi myambaro babone kwegera ibya rubanda.”
ezekiyeli:42:15: 15.Nuko arangije kugera inzu iri imbere, anjyana mu nzira iri ku irembo ry’aherekeye iburasirazuba, agera urugo impande zose.
ezekiyeli:42:16: 16.Ageresha uruhande rw’aherekeye iburasirazuba urubingo rugereshwa, ruba imbingo magana atanu.
ezekiyeli:42:17: 17.Maze ageresha uruhande rw’aherekeye ikasikazi urubingo rugereshwa, ruba imbingo magana atanu.
ezekiyeli:42:18: 18.Ageresha uruhande rw’aherekeye ikusi urubingo rugereshwa, ruba imbingo magana atanu.
ezekiyeli:42:19: 19.Ahindukirira mu ruhande rw’aherekeye iburengerazuba, ahageresha urubingo rugereshwa haba imbingo magana atanu.
ezekiyeli:42:20: 20.Agera impande enye z’inkike izengurutse inzu, uburebure bwayo buba imbingo magana atanu, n’ubugari bwayo yandi atanu. Iyo nkike yari iyo gutandukanya ibyera n’ibya rubanda.
ezekiyeli:43:1: 1.Hanyuma anjyana ku irembo, ari ryo ryerekeye iburasirazuba.
ezekiyeli:43:2: 2.Maze mbona ubwiza bw’Imana ya Isirayeli buje buturuka mu nzira y’iburasirazuba, ijwi ryayo rimeze nko guhorera kw’amazi menshi, maze isi imurikirwa n’ubwiza bwayo.
ezekiyeli:43:3: 3.Bwari bumeze nk’ibyo neretswe nabonye, igihe nazanwaga no kurimbura umurwa. Ibyo neretswe byari bimeze nk’icyo neretswe nabonye ku mugezi wa Kebari, maze ngwa nubamye.
ezekiyeli:43:4: 4.Nuko ubwiza bw’Uwiteka bwinjira mu rusengero, buturutse mu nzira iri ku irembo ry’aherekeye iburasirazuba.
ezekiyeli:43:5: 5.Umwuka aranterura anjyana mu rugo rw’imbere, ndebye mbona ubwiza bw’Uwiteka bwuzuye urusengero.
ezekiyeli:43:6: 6.Maze numva uvugana nanjye ari mu rusengero, nuko umuntu ampagarara iruhande.
ezekiyeli:43:7: 7.Arambwira ati “Mwana w’umuntu, aha hantu ni ah’intebe y’ubwami yanjye, ni n’ahantu h’ubworo bw’ibirenge byanjye, ni ho nzaba iteka ryose mbe hagati y’Abisirayeli. Kandi ab’inzu ya Isirayeli ntibazongera kwanduza izina ryanjye ukundi, ari bo cyangwa abami babo, ngo baryandurishe ubusambanyi bwabo cyangwa intumbi z’abami babo bari mu ngoro zabo,
ezekiyeli:43:8: 8.kuko bashyize inkomanizo zabo hamwe n’inkomanizo zanjye, n’inkingi zabo hamwe n’inkingi zanjye hagati yanjye na bo hakaba urusika gusa, bakandurisha izina ryanjye ryera ibizira byabo, ibyo bakoraga, ni cyo cyatumye mbarimbura ndakaye.
ezekiyeli:43:9: 9.Noneho nibamvane imbere ubusambanyi bwabo n’intumbi z’abami babo babite kure, mbone kuba muri bo iteka ryose.
ezekiyeli:43:10: 10.“Nuko rero mwana w’umuntu, ereka ab’inzu ya Isirayeli uru rusengero kugira ngo bakozwe isoni n’ibicumuro byabo, barugere bakurikije igishushanyo cyarwo.
ezekiyeli:43:11: 11.Nibakozwe isoni n’ibyo bakoze byose, ubamenyeshe uko urusengero rusa n’uko ruringanijwe, n’ahasohokerwa harwo n’ahinjirirwa harwo, n’imigabane yarwo yose n’ingero zarwo zose, n’amateka yarwo yose n’amategeko yarwo yose, ubyandike imbere yabo kugira ngo bajye bibuka uko rusa kose n’amateka yarwo yose ngo babone kubikurikiza.
ezekiyeli:43:12: 12.Iri ni ryo tegeko ry’urusengero: mu mpinga y’umusozi aho ingabano zarwo zose ziyikikije zigarukira ni ahera cyane. Dore iryo ni ryo tegeko ry’urusengero.
ezekiyeli:43:13: 13.“Kandi izi ni zo ngero z’igicaniro zigereshejwe mikono (umukono wose urengejweho intambwe y’intoki), indiba yacyo ibe mukono umwe n’ubugari bwacyo mukono umwe, umuguno wacyo ube intambwe y’intoki impande zose. Uko ni ko indiba y’igicaniro izaba imeze.
ezekiyeli:43:14: 14.Kandi uhereye hasi ku butaka ukageza ku isūbi ya mbere habe mikono ibiri, n’ubugari by’iyo sūbi bube mukono umwe. Kandi uhereye kuri iyo sūbi nto ukageza ku isūbi nini habe mikono ine, ubugari bw’iyo sūbi bube mukono umwe.
ezekiyeli:43:15: 15.Na cya gicaniro ubwacyo uburebure bw’impagarike bwacyo bube mikono ine, ku gicaniro habe amahembe ane.
ezekiyeli:43:16: 16.Igicaniro ubwacyo uburebure bw’umurambararo bwacyo bube mikono cumi n’ibiri, n’ubugari mikono cumi n’ibiri, impande zose uko ari enye zingane.
ezekiyeli:43:17: 17.Kandi umuguno wacyo uburebure bwawo bube mikono cumi n’ine, n’ubugari mikono cumi n’ine kandi impande zose uko ari enye zingane. Umuguno ugikikijeho ugisumbye ubugari bw’igice cya mukono, isūbi ya mbere igire ubugari bwa mukono umwe impande zose, kandi urwuririro rube aherekeye iburasirazuba.”
ezekiyeli:43:18: 18.Maze arambwira ati “Mwana w’umuntu, uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Aya ni yo mategeko yatanzwe ku bw’igicaniro azakurikizwa umunsi bazacyubaka, kugira ngo bagitambirireho ibitambo byoswa, no kugitonyangirizaho amaraso.
ezekiyeli:43:19: 19.Maze abatambyi b’Abalewi b’urubyaro rwa Sadoki banyegera kugira ngo bankorere, ubahe ikimasa kibe igitambo gitambirwa ibyaha. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:43:20: 20.Uzende ku maraso yacyo uyashyire ku mahembe ane yacyo, no ku nkokora enye z’umuguno no ku mpande z’umuguno zose. Ni ko kizezwa no kugitangirira impongano.
ezekiyeli:43:21: 21.Maze uzende icyo kimasa cy’igitambo gitambirwa ibyaha, ugitwikire ahategetswe h’urusengero inyuma y’ubuturo bwera.
ezekiyeli:43:22: 22.Naho ku munsi wa kabiri, uzatambe isekurume y’ihene idafite inenge ho igitambo gitambirwa ibyaha, maze beze igicaniro nk’uko bacyejesheje ikimasa.
ezekiyeli:43:23: 23.Numara kucyeza uzatambe ikimasa kidafite inenge, n’isekurume y’intama yo mu mukumbi idafite inenge.
ezekiyeli:43:24: 24.Kandi uzabizane imbere y’Uwiteka maze abatambyi babitere umunyu, babitambirire Uwiteka bibe ibitambo byoswa.
ezekiyeli:43:25: 25.Mu minsi irindwi uko bukeye uzajye utamba ihene ho igitambo gitambirwa ibyaha, bazatambe n’ikimasa n’isekurume y’intama yo mu mukumbi idafite inenge.
ezekiyeli:43:26: 26.Mu minsi irindwi bajye batangira igicaniro impongano kandi bakacyeza, uko ni ko bazakigira icyera.
ezekiyeli:43:27: 27.Nibarangiza iyo minsi, ku munsi wa munani no mu yindi ikurikiyeho, abatambyi bazajye babatambirira ibitambo ku gicaniro, ibitambo byanyu byoswa n’ibitambo byanyu by’uko hariho amahoro, nanjye nzabibashimira. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.”
ezekiyeli:44:1: 1.Maze angarura mu nzira y’irembo ry’ubuturo bwera riri inyuma ryerekeye iburasirazuba, ariko ryari ryugariwe.
ezekiyeli:44:2: 2.Nuko Uwiteka arambwira ati “Iri rembo rihore ryugariye, ntirikugururwe kandi ntihakagire umuntu urinyuramo, kuko Uwiteka Imana ya Isirayeli yarinyuzemo ni cyo gituma rihora ryugariye.
ezekiyeli:44:3: 3.Umwami ni we uzahicara, afungurire imbere y’Uwiteka kuko ari umwami. Ajye yinjira anyuze mu nzira y’ibaraza ry’iryo rembo, kandi nasohoka abe ari yo anyuramo.”
ezekiyeli:44:4: 4.Maze anjyana mu nzira y’irembo ryerekeye ikasikazi, angeza imbere y’urusengero. Nuko ndebye mbona ubwiza bw’Uwiteka bwuzuye inzu y’Uwiteka, mperako ngwa nubamye.
ezekiyeli:44:5: 5.Nuko Uwiteka arambwira ati “Mwana w’umuntu, gira umwete urebeshe amaso yawe kandi wumvishe amatwi yawe, ibyo nkubwira byose byerekeye ku mategeko y’urusengero rw’Uwiteka yose no ku mateka yarwo yose, kandi umenye neza ahinjirirwa h’urwo rusengero n’ahasohokerwa hose h’ubuturo bwera.
ezekiyeli:44:6: 6.“Uzabwire ba bagome ari bo ab’inzu ya Isirayeli uti ‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Mwa b’inzu ya Isirayeli mwe, ibizira byanyu byose birahagije,
ezekiyeli:44:7: 7.ubwo mwazanye abanyamahanga badakebwe mu mutima no ku mubiri mu buturo bwanjye bwera ngo babwanduze, ari bwo nzu yanjye, igihe mutanze umutsima wanjye n’ibinure n’amaraso, maze bakica isezerano ryanjye bakongera ibizira byanyu byose.
ezekiyeli:44:8: 8.Kandi ntimwitondera umurimo w’ubuturo bwanjye bwera, ahubwo mwabashyize mu kigwi cyanyu ngo bakore umurimo w’ubuturo bwanjye bwera.
ezekiyeli:44:9: 9.Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Nta munyamahanga udakebwe mu mutima no ku mubiri uzinjira mu buturo bwanjye bwera, habe n’uwo mu banyamahanga bari mu Bisirayeli.
ezekiyeli:44:10: 10.“ ‘Kandi n’Abalewi banyimūye, igihe Abisirayeli bayobye bakanta bagakurikira ibigirwamana byabo, bazagibwaho n’ibibi byabo.
ezekiyeli:44:11: 11.Ariko bazakora mu buturo bwanjye bwera ari abakumirizi b’amarembo y’urusengero, kandi bakore n’imirimo yo mu rusengero, bazajya babaga ibitambo byoswa n’ibindi bitambo bya rubanda, kandi bahagarare imbere yabo ngo babakorere.
ezekiyeli:44:12: 12.Kuko babakoreye bari imbere y’ibigirwamana byabo, bakabera ab’inzu ya Isirayeli igisitaza cyo kubacumuza, ni cyo cyatumye mbaramburiraho ukuboko kwanjye, kandi bazagibwaho n’ibibi byabo. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:44:13: 13.Ntabwo bazanyegera, ngo bankorere umurimo w’ubutambyi, cyangwa kugira icyo begera cyo mu bintu byanjye byera biri ahera cyane, ahubwo bazagibwaho no gukozwa isoni kwabo, n’ibizira bakoze.
ezekiyeli:44:14: 14.Nyamara nzabagira abarinzi b’urusengero, mbahe gukora umurimo waho n’imirimo yose ikwiriye kurukorerwamo.
ezekiyeli:44:15: 15.“‘Abatambyi b’abalewi bene Sadoki bajyaga bakora umurimo wo mu buturo bwanjye bwera igihe Abisirayeli bayobye bakanyimūra, ni bo bazanyegera kugira ngo bankorere. Bazajya bampagarara imbere banture ibinure n’amaraso. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:44:16: 16.Kandi bazajye binjira mu buturo bwanjye bwera begere ameza yanjye kugira ngo bankorere, bakurikize amategeko yanjye.
ezekiyeli:44:17: 17.Nibinjira mu marembo y’urugo rw’imbere bazajya baza bambaye imyambaro y’ibitare. Ntibakagire icyo bambara kirimo ubwoya igihe bakorera ku marembo y’urugo rw’imbere no mu rusengero.
ezekiyeli:44:18: 18.Bajye bambara ibitambaro by’ibitare ku mutwe, bambare n’amakabutura y’ibitare, ntibakagire icyo bambara cyabatera gututubikana.
ezekiyeli:44:19: 19.Kandi nibasohoka bagiye mu rugo rw’inyuma ari rwo rwa rubanda, bajye biyambura imyambaro yabo, iyo bambara bakorera Imana, bayibike mu byumba byera maze bambare indi myambaro kugira ngo bateza rubanda bambaye iyo myambaro yabo.
ezekiyeli:44:20: 20.“‘Kandi ntibakimoze cyangwa ngo batereke umusatsi, bajye biyogoshesha gusa.
ezekiyeli:44:21: 21.Ntihakagire uwo mu batambyi unywa inzoga igihe bagiye kwinjira mu rugo rw’imbere.
ezekiyeli:44:22: 22.Kandi ntibagacyure abapfakazi cyangwa abagore basenzw, ahubwo bajye barongora abageni bo mu rubyaro rw’ab’inzu ya Isirayeli, cyangwa se bacyure abapfakazi barongowe n’abatambyi.
ezekiyeli:44:23: 23.“‘Bajye bigisha ubwoko bwanjye gutandukanya ibyera n’ibitejejwe, kandi babumenyeshe ibyanduye n’ibitanduye.
ezekiyeli:44:24: 24.Nihaba urubanza bajye baruca bakurikije ibihwanye n’amategeko yanjye, kandi bajye bakomereza amategeko yanjye n’amateka yanjye mu birori byanjye byategetswe byose, beze n’amasabato yanjye.
ezekiyeli:44:25: 25.“‘Ntibakegere intumbi y’umuntu kugira ngo badahumana, keretse se w’uwo mutambyi cyangwa nyina, cyangwa umuhungu we cyangwa umukobwa we, cyangwa uwo bava inda imwe cyangwa mushiki we udafite umugabo, abo ni bo bakwihumanisha.
ezekiyeli:44:26: 26.Namara guhumanuka bamubarire iminsi irindwi.
ezekiyeli:44:27: 27.Umunsi azasubira mu buturo bwera mu rugo rw’imbere kugira ngo ahakorere, azatanga igitambo cye gitambirirwa ibyaha. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:44:28: 28.“‘Kandi bazagira umwandu. Ni jye mwandu wabo, mwe kuzagira umwandu mubaha muri Isirayeli, ni jye mwandu wabo.
ezekiyeli:44:29: 29.Bajye barya ituro ry’ifu n’igitambo gitambirwa ibyaha, n’igitambo gikuraho urubanza, kandi ikintu cyose cyashinganiwe Imana mu Bisirayeli kibe icyabo.
ezekiyeli:44:30: 30.Umuganura w’imyaka yose n’amaturo yose y’ibyo mwejeje muzatanga, bibe iby’abatambyi kandi mujye muha abatambyi umuganura w’irobe ryanyu, kugira ngo amazu yanyu ahabwe umugisha.
ezekiyeli:44:31: 31.Abatambyi ntibakagire icyo barya cyabyukiwe cyangwa igikanka, ari ikiguruka cyangwa itungo.
ezekiyeli:45:1: 1.“ ‘Maze kandi igihe muzagabanisha igihugu ubufindo mo gakondo, muzature Uwiteka ho ituro ryererejwe umugabane wera w’igihugu, uburebure bwawo buzabe ubw’imbingo ibihumbi makumyabiri n’eshanu, n’ubugari bwawo ibihumbi cumi: uzabe uwera mu ngabano zawo zose.
ezekiyeli:45:2: 2.Uwo mugabane muzawendaho ah’ubuturo bwera, uburebure bwaho bube ubw’imbingo magana atanu, n’ubugari bwaho imbingo magana atanu, mu mpande zose uko ari enye hangane, kandi ahahakikije hose harimo ubusa, habe ubwa mikono mirongo itanu.
ezekiyeli:45:3: 3.Nuko rero muri uwo mugabane uzagere uburebure bw’imbingo ibihumbi makumyabiri na bitanu, n’ubugari ibihumbi cumi, muri wo hazaba ubuturo bwera n’ahera cyane.
ezekiyeli:45:4: 4.Uwo ni umugabane wera w’igihugu, uzabe uw’abatambyi bakorera mu buturo bwera, begera Uwiteka bakamukorera, kandi ni ho bazubaka amazu yabo, kandi habe n’ahantu hera h’ubuturo bwera.
ezekiyeli:45:5: 5.Abalewi bakorera mu rusengero bazahabwa uburebure bw’umurambararo bw’imbingo ibihumbi makumyabiri na bitanu, n’ubugari bwaho ibihumbi cumi, habe umwandu wabo, bahagire n’utuzu makumyabiri.
ezekiyeli:45:6: 6.“ ‘Kandi muzategekere ah’umurwa, ubugari bwaho bube ubw’imbingo ibihumbi bitanu, n’uburebure bwaho imbingo ibihumbi makumyabiri na bitanu, iruhande rw’umugabane wera watoranijwe, habe ah’ab’inzu ya Isirayeli bose.
ezekiyeli:45:7: 7.“ ‘Kandi muzatoranirize umwami umugabane mu mpande zombi z’umugabane wera n’ah’umudugudu, imbere y’umugabane wera n’imbere y’ah’umudugudu, mu ruhande rw’iburengerazuba rwerekeye iburengerazuba, no mu ruhande rw’iburasirazuba rwerekeye iburasirazuba, uburebure bwacyo bureshye n’uburebure bw’umugabane umwe, uhereye mu ruhande rw’iburengerazuba ukageza mu ruhande rw’iburasirazuba.
ezekiyeli:45:8: 8.Hazamubera umugabane w’umwandu muri Isirayeli, kandi abami banjye ntabwo bazongera kurenganya ubwoko banjye, ahubwo bazagabanya ab’inzu ya Isirayeli igihugu nk’uko imiryango yabo iri.
ezekiyeli:45:9: 9.“‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Birahagije, mwa bami ba Isirayeli mwe. Nimureke kugira urugomo no kunyaga, mugire imanza zitabera no gukiranuka, mukize ubwoko bwanjye amakoro arenze urugero. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:45:10: 10.“‘Mugire iminzani itunganye na efa itunganye, n’incuro y’intango itunganye.
ezekiyeli:45:11: 11.“‘Efa n’incuro y’intango bibe urugero rumwe, kugira ngo incuro y’intango ibe kimwe cya cumi cya homeru, na efa ibe kimwe cya cumi cya homeru, ingero zabyo zigereranywe na homeru.
ezekiyeli:45:12: 12.“‘Shekeli ibemo gera makumyabiri, shekeli makumyabiri na shekeli makumyabiri n’eshanu, na shekeli cumi n’eshanu zibe ari zo ziba mane yanyu.
ezekiyeli:45:13: 13.“‘Iri ni ryo turo muzatura: kimwe cya gatandatu cya efa y’ingano zikuwe mu ncuro ya homeru, muture na kimwe cya gatandatu cya efa ya sayiri mu ncuro ya homeru,
ezekiyeli:45:14: 14.n’urugero rw’amavuta ya elayo rwategetswe yo mu ncuro y’intango y’amavuta ya elayo, kimwe cya cumi cy’intango yo mu ncuro ya koru, ari zo ntango cumi cyangwa homeru, kuko intango cumi ari homeru imwe,
ezekiyeli:45:15: 15.n’umwana w’intama umwe wo mu mukumbi w’intama magana abiri, zo mu rwuri rw’imisubirane za Isirayeli, bibe ituro ry’ifu n’igitambo cyoswa, n’igitambo cy’uko ari amahoro kugira ngo bahongererwe. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:45:16: 16.“ ‘Abantu bose bo mu gihugu bazaturira umwami wa Isirayeli iryo turo.
ezekiyeli:45:17: 17.Ariko umwami we azatanga ibitambo byoswa, n’amaturo y’ifu, n’amaturo y’ibyokunywa mu bihe by’ibirori no mu mboneko z’ukwezi, no ku masabato, no mu minsi mikuru yose inzu ya Isirayeli yategetswe. Azatanga igitambo gitambirwa ibyaha, n’ituro ry’ifu, n’igitambo cyoswa, n’igitambo cy’uko ari amahoro, kugira ngo ahongerere inzu ya Isirayeli.
ezekiyeli:45:18: 18.“ ‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Mu kwezi kwa mbere, ku munsi wa mbere w’uko kwezi, uzende ikimasa kidafite inenge maze weze ubuturo bwera.
ezekiyeli:45:19: 19.Umutambyi azende ku maraso y’igitambo gitambirirwa ibyaha, ayashyire ku nkomanizo z’urusengero, no ku mfuruka enye z’umuguno w’igicaniro, no ku bikingi by’irembo ry’urugo rw’imbere.
ezekiyeli:45:20: 20.Uko ni ko ku munsi wa karindwi w’ukwezi, uzagenzereza uwo byagwiririye wese n’umuntu w’umuswa. Ni ko muzahongerera urusengero.
ezekiyeli:45:21: 21.“ ‘Mu kwezi kwa mbere, ku munsi wa cumi n’ine w’uko kwezi muzagire Pasika, ibe ibirori by’iminsi irindwi, imitsima idasembuwe abe ari yo iribwa.
ezekiyeli:45:22: 22.Kandi uwo munsi umwami azatanga ikimasa ho igitambo gitambirwa ibyaha, ku bwe no ku bwa rubanda rwose rwo mu gihugu.
ezekiyeli:45:23: 23.Mu minsi irindwi y’ibirori azature Uwiteka igitambo cyoswa, ibimasa birindwi, n’amasekurume y’intama adafite inenge arindwi, uko bukeye bw’iyo minsi uko ari irindwi, n’isekurume y’ihene ho igitambo gitambirwa ibyaha mu munsi wose.
ezekiyeli:45:24: 24.Kandi azature n’ituro ry’ifu, ku kimasa cyose efa imwe y’ifu, no ku isekurume y’intama efa imwe, na hini y’amavuta ya elayo kuri efa yose y’ifu.
ezekiyeli:45:25: 25.“‘Mu kwezi kwa karindwi, ku munsi wa cumi n’itanu w’uko kwezi, ni ko azagenza mu gihe cy’ibirori by’iminsi irindwi, kandi ni ko azagenza n’igitambo gitambirwa ibyaha, n’igitambo cyoswa, n’ituro ry’ifu, n’amavuta ya elayo.
ezekiyeli:46:1: 1.“‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Irembo ry’urugo ry’imbere ryerekeye iburasirazuba rijye ryugarirwa mu minsi itandatu y’umurimo, ariko ku munsi w’isabato ryugururwe, kandi ryugururwe no ku munsi wa mbere ukwezi kwabonetseho.
ezekiyeli:46:2: 2.Umwami ajye yinjira anyuze mu nzira yo kw’ibaraza ry’irembo ry’inyuma, maze ahagarare iruhande rw’igikingi cy’irembo, abatambyi batambe igitambo cye cyoswa, n’igitambo cye cy’uko ari amahoro, maze asengere mu bikingi by’amarembo ahereko ahave, ariko iryo rembo rye kugarirwa kugeza nimugoroba.
ezekiyeli:46:3: 3.Kandi rubanda rwo mu gihugu rujye rusengera Uwiteka imbere y’iryo rembo ku masabato no mu mboneko z’ukwezi.
ezekiyeli:46:4: 4.“ ‘Igitambo cyoswa umwami azajya atambirira Uwiteka ku munsi w’isabato, ni abana b’intama badafite inenge batandatu n’isekurume y’intama idafite inenge,
ezekiyeli:46:5: 5.kandi ituro ry’ifu ku bw’isekurume y’intama ribe efa imwe, n’ituro ry’ifu ku bw’abana b’intama ribe nk’uko ashaka, n’amavuta ya elayo hini imwe ku bwa efa y’ifu.
ezekiyeli:46:6: 6.Kandi ku munsi wa mbere ukwezi kwabonetseho, azajye atanga ikimasa kidafite inenge n’abana b’intama batandatu, n’isekurume y’intama bidafite inenge,
ezekiyeli:46:7: 7.kandi atange n’ituro ry’ifu, ku bw’ikimasa efa imwe, na efa imwe ku bw’isekurume y’intama, no ku bw’abana b’intama nk’uko ashaka, n’amavuta ya elayo hini imwe ku bwa efa y’ifu.
ezekiyeli:46:8: 8.Kandi umwami niyinjira ajye anyura mu nzira yo kw’ibaraza ry’irembo, iyo nzira abe ari yo asohokeramo.
ezekiyeli:46:9: 9.“ ‘Ariko rubanda rwo mu gihugu niruza imbere y’Uwiteka mu minsi y’ibirori byabo byera, uzinjira anyuze mu nzira y’irembo ryerekeye ikasikazi aje gusenga, azatunguke mu nzira yo ku irembo ryerekeye ikusi, kandi uzinjira anyuze mu nzira y’irembo ryerekeye ikusi, azatunguke mu nzira y’irembo ryerekeye ikasikazi, ntazatunguke mu nzira y’irembo yinjiriyemo, ahubwo azaromboreze imbere ye.
ezekiyeli:46:10: 10.Kandi umwami ajye yinjirana na bo binjiye, nibasohoka asohokane na bo.
ezekiyeli:46:11: 11.Mu minsi y’ibirori no mu minsi mikuru, ituro ry’ifu rijye riba efa imwe ku bw’ikimasa, na efa imwe ku bw’isekurume y’intama, no ku bw’abana b’intama nk’uko ashaka, n’amavuta ya elayo hini imwe ku bwa efa y’ifu.
ezekiyeli:46:12: 12.“ ‘Kandi igihe umwami azaturira Uwiteka igitambo abyishakiye, ari igitambo cyoswa cyangwa igitambo cy’uko ari amahoro, azugururirwe irembo ryerekeye iburasirazuba, atambe igitambo cye cyoswa n’ibitambo bye by’uko ari amahoro, nk’uko ajya agenza ku munsi w’isabato maze asohoke, namara guhita irembo ryugarirwe.
ezekiyeli:46:13: 13.“ ‘Kandi nawe ujye utambirira Uwiteka umwana w’intama, umaze umwaka umwe kandi udafite inenge ho igitambo cyoswa iminsi yose, ujye uwutamba uko bukeye.
ezekiyeli:46:14: 14.Kandi uwutangane n’ituro ry’ifu uko bukeye, kimwe cya gatandatu cya efa imwe, na kimwe cya gatatu cya hini y’amavuta ya elayo yo gutosa iyo fu nziza. Uko ni ko ituro ry’ifu riturwa Uwiteka rizaba rimeze. Ni itegeko ritazakuka iteka ryose.
ezekiyeli:46:15: 15.Kandi ni ko bazajya batanga n’umwana w’intama, n’ituro ry’ifu, n’amavuta ya elayo uko bukeye, kuba igitambo cyoswa gihoraho.
ezekiyeli:46:16: 16.“‘Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo: Umwami nagira icyo aha umwe wo mu bahungu be cy’ubuntu, kizaba gakondo ye, kibe icy’abahungu be babe bene cyo, kuko ari gakondo yabo.
ezekiyeli:46:17: 17.Ariko nagira icyo aha umwe mu bagaragu be agikuye muri gakondo ye, kizaba ari icye kugeza mu mwaka wo gukomorerwa, maze gisubizwe umwami, ariko gakondo ye izaba iy’abahungu be.
ezekiyeli:46:18: 18.Kandi umwami ntagatware gakondo ya rubanda ku rugomo ngo abavane muri gakondo yabo, ahubwo ajye aha abahungu be ibyo akuye muri gakondo ye bwite, kugira ngo ubwoko bwanjye budatatana, umuntu wese akava muri gakondo ye.’ ”
ezekiyeli:46:19: 19.Maze anjyana ahanyurwa h’iruhande rw’irembo, angeza mu twumba twera tw’abatambyi twerekeye ikasikazi, mpabona ahantu hari hirya, herekeye iburengerazuba.
ezekiyeli:46:20: 20.Arambwira ati “Hariya hantu ni ho abatambyi bazajya bateka igitambo gikuraho urubanza n’ikindi gitambo gitambirirwa ibyaha, kandi ni ho bazajya botsa ituro ry’ifu, kugira ngo batabijyana hanze mu rugo rw’inyuma babyejesha rubanda.”
ezekiyeli:46:21: 21.Maze anjyana mu rugo rw’inyuma, anyuza mu matako ane y’urugo, ndebye mbona ku matako y’inkike yose y’urugo hari ingombe.
ezekiyeli:46:22: 22.Mu matako ane y’urugo hari ingombe zizitiweho, uburebure bwazo ari mikono mirongo ine, n’ubugari bwazo mikono mirongo itatu, zose uko ziri mu matako ane yazo zihwanije urugero.
ezekiyeli:46:23: 23.Izo ngombe imbere yazo uko ari enye hari hakikije inkike, muri izo nkike hari amaziko impande zose.
ezekiyeli:46:24: 24.Maze arambwira ati “Aya mazu ni ayo gutekwamo, aho abakorera urusengero bazajya bateka ibitambo bya rubanda.”
ezekiyeli:47:1: Amazi ava mu rusengero atemba nk’uruzi1.Nuko angarura ku muryango w’urusengero, ndebye mbona amazi atemba ava munsi y’irebe ryarwo aherekeye iburasirazuba, kuko urusengero rwari rwerekeye iburasirazuba. Nuko ayo mazi atemba ava iburyo bwarwo, ikusi h’igicaniro.
ezekiyeli:47:2: 2.Maze ansohorera mu nzira y’irembo ryerekeye ikasikazi, anzengurukana mu nzira iri hanze, angeza ku irembo ry’inyuma aherekeye iburasirazuba. Ndebye mbona amazi atemba, anyura mu ruhande rw’iburyo.
ezekiyeli:47:3: 3.Uwo muntu agana iburasirazuba, afite umugozi mu ntoki wo kugeresha agera mikono igihumbi, anyuza muri ayo mazi, amazi angera mu bugombambari.
ezekiyeli:47:4: 4.Arongera agera mikono igihumbi, anyuza muri ayo mazi, amazi angera mu mavi. Arongera agera mikono igihumbi, anyuza muri ayo mazi, amazi angera mu rukenyerero.
ezekiyeli:47:5: 5.Arongera agera indi mikono igihumbi, aba abaye umugezi ntabasha kwambuka, kuko yari abaye amazi menshi yakwambukwa n’uzi koga, ari umugezi utambukishwa amaguru.
ezekiyeli:47:6: 6.Maze arambwira ati “Mwana w’umuntu, mbese ibyo urabibonye?” Arangarura angeza ku nkombe y’umugezi.
ezekiyeli:47:7: 7.Amaze kungarura, mbona ku nkombe y’umugezi hari ibiti byinshi cyane mu mpande zombi.
ezekiyeli:47:8: 8.Maze arambwira ati “Aya mazi atemba agana iburasirazuba, azagera no muri Araba kandi agere no mu nyanja, nagera mu nyanja, amazi yo muri yo azakira.
ezekiyeli:47:9: 9.Kandi ikizima cyose kiri mu mazi, ayo uwo mugezi utemberamo yose kizabaho. Hazabamo n’amafi menshi cyane, kuko amazi y’aho ya mazi azagera azaba meza, ikizima cyose kiri aho uwo mugezi ugeze kikabaho.
ezekiyeli:47:10: 10.Abarobyi bazahagarara ku nkombe zawo, uhereye muri Enigedi ukageza muri Enegulayimu hazaba aho kwanika inshundura. Uzabamo amafi y’amoko atari amwe nk’amafi yo mu nyanja, kandi azaba ari menshi cyane.
ezekiyeli:47:11: 11.Ariko ibyondo by’isayo byaho n’ibishanga byaho ntabwo bizabonezwa, bizatabwa bibe ah’umunyu.
ezekiyeli:47:12: 12.Ku nkombe z’uwo mugezi, mu mpande zombi hazamera igiti cyose cyera ibiribwa, ibibabi byabyo ntabwo bizuma, n’amatunda yabyo ntabwo azabura. Bizajya byera uko ukwezi gutashye, kuko amazi yaho ava mu buturo bwera. Amatunda yabyo azaba ibyokurya, na byo ibibabi byabyo bibe umuti uvura.”
ezekiyeli:47:13: 13.Uku ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga ngo “Uru ni rwo rugabano rw’igihugu muzagabanya imiryango cumi n’ibiri ya Isirayeli ho gakondo: Yosefu azagira imigabane ibiri.
ezekiyeli:47:14: 14.Kandi umuntu wese wo muri mwe azabona umugabane, nta wuzacikanwa kuko narahiye ba sogokuruza kukibaha. Iki gihugu kizaba gakondo yanyu.
ezekiyeli:47:15: 15.“Uru ni rwo ruzaba urugabano rw’igihugu: mu ruhande rw’ikasikazi uhereye ku Nyanja Nini, ku nzira y’i Hetiloni ukageza i Sedadi,
ezekiyeli:47:16: 16.i Hamati n’i Berota n’i Siburayimu, hari hagati y’urugabano rw’i Damasiko n’urugabano rw’i Hamati n’i Haserihatikoni hari mu rugabano rw’i Hawurani.
ezekiyeli:47:17: 17.Kandi uhereye ku nyanja urugabano ruzaba i Hasarenani hari mu rugabano rw’i Damasiko n’urugabano rw’i Hamati, ikasikazi. Urwo ni rwo ruhande rw’ikasikazi.
ezekiyeli:47:18: 18.“Mu ruhande rw’iburasirazuba, hagati y’i Hawurani n’i Damasiko n’i Galeyadi, n’igihugu cya Isirayeli, hazaba Yorodani. Muzagere muhereye mu rugabano rw’ikasikazi mugeze ku nyanja y’iburasirazuba. Urwo ni rwo ruhande rw’iburasirazuba.
ezekiyeli:47:19: 19.“Mu ruhande rw’ikusi aherekeye ikusi, uhereye i Tamari ukageza ku mazi y’i Meribati Kadeshi, no ku mugezi wa Egiputa ku Nyanja Nini. Ni rwo ruhande rw’ikusi aherekeye ikusi.
ezekiyeli:47:20: 20.Mu ruhande rw’iburengerazuba hazaba Inyanja Nini, uhereye mu rugabano rw’ikusi ukageza ahateganye n’i Hamati. Urwo ni rwo ruhande rw’iburengerazuba.
ezekiyeli:47:21: 21.“Ni ko muzagabanya icyo gihugu, uko imiryango ya Isirayeli ingana.
ezekiyeli:47:22: 22.Maze muzakigabanishe ubufindo kibe gakondo yanyu, mwe n’abanyamahanga babarimo bakabyarira abana muri mwe, bazabamerera nk’ababyawe n’Abisirayeli. Bazaherwa gakondo hamwe namwe mu miryango ya Isirayeli.
ezekiyeli:47:23: 23.Umuryango umunyamahanga azaba arimo, abe ari wo aherwamo gakondo. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:48:1: 1.“Aya ni yo mazina y’imiryango uhereye aherekera ikasikazi, ahakikiye inzira y’i Hetiloni ukageza i Hamati, n’i Hasarenani h’urugabano rw’i Damasiko ikasikazi hateganye n’i Hamati, hagati y’aherekeye iburasirazuba, n’iburengerazuba hazaba umugabane wa Dani.
ezekiyeli:48:2: 2.Uhereye iburasirazuba hateganye n’urugabano rwa Dani ukageza aherekeye iburengerazuba, hazaba umugabane wa Asheri.
ezekiyeli:48:3: 3.Kandi uhereye iburasirazuba hateganye n’urugabano rwa Asheri ukageza aherekeye iburengerazuba, hazaba umugabane wa Nafutali.
ezekiyeli:48:4: 4.Uhereye iburasirazuba hateganye n’urugabano rwa Nafutali ukageza aherekeye iburengerazuba, hazaba umugabane wa Manase.
ezekiyeli:48:5: 5.Uhereye iburasirazuba hateganye n’urugabano rwa Manase ukageza aherekeye iburengerazuba, hazaba umugabane wa Efurayimu.
ezekiyeli:48:6: 6.Uhereye iburasirazuba hateganye n’urugabano rwa Efurayimu ukageza aherekeye iburengerazuba, hazaba umugabane wa Rubeni.
ezekiyeli:48:7: 7.Uhereye iburasirazuba hateganye n’urugabano rwa Rubeni ukageza aherekeye iburasirazuba, hazaba umugabane wa Yuda.
ezekiyeli:48:8: 8.“Uhereye iburasirazuba hateganye n’urugabano rwa Yuda ukageza aherekeye iburengerazuba, hazaba umugabane wejejwe muzaturaho amaturo, ubugari bwawo buzaba ubw’imbingo ibihumbi makumyabiri na bitanu, kandi uburebure bwawo buzahwane n’indi migabane uhereye aherekeye iburasirazuba ukageza aherekeye iburengerazuba, kandi ubuturo bwera buzawubemo hagati.
ezekiyeli:48:9: 9.“Umugabane wera muzatura Uwiteka, uburebure bwawo buzabe imbingo ibihumbi makumyabiri na bitanu, n’ubugari ibihumbi cumi.
ezekiyeli:48:10: 10.Uwo mugabane wera uzaba uw’abatambyi. Aherekeye ikasikazi hawo uburebure bwawo buzaba ibihumbi makumyabiri na bitanu, n’aherekeye iburengerazuba ubugari bwawo buzaba ibihumbi cumi, n’aherekeye iburasirazuba ubugari bwawo buzaba ibihumbi cumi, n’aherekeye ikusi uburebure bwawo buzaba ibihumbi makumyabiri na bitanu, kandi ubuturo bwera bw’Uwiteka buzabe hagati yaho.
ezekiyeli:48:11: 11.Uzabe uw’abatambyi bejejwe bo muri bene Sadoki, bakomeje kunkorera ntibanyimūre, igihe Abisirayeli bayobye nk’uko Abalewi bayobye.
ezekiyeli:48:12: 12.Uwo mugabane uzababere uwera cyane ukuwe mu migabane y’igihugu, kandi ubangikanye n’urugabano rw’uw’Abalewi.
ezekiyeli:48:13: 13.“Abalewi na bo bazagira umugabane ukikije ku rugabano rw’abatambyi, uburebure bwawo buzabe ibihumbi makumyabiri na bitanu, n’ubugari ibihumbi cumi. Uburebure bwose buzabe ibihumbi makumyabiri na bitanu, n’ubugari ibihumbi cumi.
ezekiyeli:48:14: 14.Kandi ntihazagire ikigurwa cyo muri wo cyangwa ngo kiguranwe, kandi umuganura w’igihugu ntuzabe uw’abandi, kuko cyerejwe Uwiteka.
ezekiyeli:48:15: 15.“Ibihumbi bitanu byasigaye ku bugari bw’ibihumbi makumyabiri na bitanu hazaba aha rubanda, no kubaka umurwa urimo ubuturo n’imihana yawo, uwo murwa uzabe hagati yaho.
ezekiyeli:48:16: 16.Izi ni zo ngero zawo: uruhande rw’ikasikazi ruzabe ibihumbi bine na magana atanu, uruhande rw’ikusi ruzabe ibihumbi bine na magana atanu, uruhande rw’iburasirazuba ruzabe ibihumbi bine na magana atanu, n’uruhande rw’iburengerazuba ibihumbi bine na magana atanu.
ezekiyeli:48:17: 17.Kandi umurwa uzagire imihana: aherekeye ikasikazi hazabe magana abiri na mirongo itanu, aherekeye ikusi hazabe magana abiri na mirongo itanu, aherekeye iburasirazuba hazabe magana abiri na mirongo itanu, n’aherekeye iburengerazuba magana abiri na mirongo itanu.
ezekiyeli:48:18: 18.Ahasigaye hateganye n’uburebure bw’umugabane wera, uruhande rwaho rw’aherekeye iburasirazuba ruzabe ibihumbi cumi, n’urw’aherekeye iburengerazuba ibihumbi cumi. Hazabe hateganye n’umugabane w’ubuturo bwera, kandi umwero waho ujye uba ibyokurya by’abakora mu murwa.
ezekiyeli:48:19: 19.Abakora mu murwa bo mu miryango yose ya Isirayeli, bajye bahahinga.
ezekiyeli:48:20: 20.“Umugabane wera wose uzabe ibihumbi makumyabiri na bitanu ku bihumbi makumyabiri na bitanu. Muzature ituro ry’umugabane w’ubuturo bwera, ufite impande enye zingana n’ah’umurwa.
ezekiyeli:48:21: 21.“Ahasigaye ho mu mpande zombi z’umugabane wera n’umurwa, hazabe ah’umwami. Ahateganye n’ibihumbi makumyabiri na bitanu by’umugabane wera herekeye mu ruhande rw’iburasirazuba, n’ahateganye n’ibihumbi makumyabiri na bitanu by’umugabane wera herekeye mu ruhande rw’iburengerazuba, hateganye n’iyo migabane, hazabe ah’umwami kandi umugabane wera n’ubuturo bwera bw’urusengero bizabe hagati yarwo.
ezekiyeli:48:22: 22.Maze kandi uhereye ku mugabane w’Abalewi n’ah’umurwa, uri hagati ya gakondo y’umwami, hagati y’urugabano rwa Yuda n’urugabano rwa Benyamini, hazabe ah’umwami.
ezekiyeli:48:23: 23.“Na yo imiryango isigaye, uhereye aherekeye iburasirazuba ukageza aherekeye iburengerazuba, hazabe umugabane wa Benyamini.
ezekiyeli:48:24: 24.Uhereye iburasirazuba hateganye n’umugabane wa Benyamini ukageza aherekeye iburengerazuba, hazabe umugabane wa Simiyoni.
ezekiyeli:48:25: 25.Uhereye iburasirazuba hateganye n’umugabane wa Simiyoni ukageza aherekeye iburengerazuba, hazabe umugabane wa Isakari.
ezekiyeli:48:26: 26.Uhereye iburasirazuba hateganye n’umugabane wa Isakari ukageza aherekeye iburengerazuba, hazabe umugabane wa Zebuluni.
ezekiyeli:48:27: 27.Uhereye iburasirazuba hateganye n’umugabane wa Zebuluni ukageza aherekeye iburengerazuba, hazabe umugabane wa Gadi.
ezekiyeli:48:28: 28.“Kandi uhereye aherekeye ikusi h’urugabano rwa Gadi, urugabano ruzabe uhereye i Tamari ukageza ku mazi y’i Meribati Kadeshi no ku mugezi wa Egiputa ku Nyanja Nini.
ezekiyeli:48:29: 29.“Icyo ni cyo gihugu muzagabanisha imiryango ya Isirayeli ubufindo kuba gakondo yabo, kandi iyo ni yo migabane yabo. Ni ko Umwami Uwiteka avuga.
ezekiyeli:48:30: 30.“Aya ni yo marembo y’umurwa: mu ruhande rw’ikasikazi ni imbingo ibihumbi bine na magana atanu,
ezekiyeli:48:31: 31.kandi amarembo y’umurwa azitirirwa amazina y’imiryango ya Isirayeli, mu ruhande rw’ikasikazi amarembo atatu, rimwe ribe irembo rya Rubeni, irindi ribe irembo rya Yuda, irindi ribe irembo rya Lewi.
ezekiyeli:48:32: 32.No mu ruhande rw’iburasirazuba h’imbingo ibihumbi bine na magana atanu habe amarembo atatu, rimwe ribe irembo rya Yosefu, irindi ribe irembo rya Benyamini, irindi ribe irembo rya Dani.
ezekiyeli:48:33: 33.No mu ruhande rw’ikusi hagereshejwe imbingo ibihumbi bine na magana atanu habe amarembo atatu, rimwe ribe irembo rya Simiyoni, irindi ribe irembo rya Isakari, irindi ribe irembo rya Zebuluni.
ezekiyeli:48:34: 34.No mu ruhande rw’iburengerazuba h’imbingo ibihumbi bine na magana atanu habe amarembo atatu, rimwe ribe irembo rya Gadi, irindi ribe irembo rya Asheri, irindi ribe irembo rya Nafutali.
ezekiyeli:48:35: 35.Ahawukikije hose hazabe imbingo ibihumbi cumi n’umunani, kandi uhereye uwo munsi uwo murwa uzitwa ngo ‘Uwiteka ni ho ari.’ ”
